title: Solution Configuration Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**

  

Join us at BNEW EUHW ST CHR, where we act as the glue between organizations, enabling efficient commercial handling and release of Ericsson products. Our mission is to investigate and orchestrate optimal ways of working from both the customer and Ericsson's perspectives, leveraging opportunities and driving necessary changes. Our vision is to provide an excellent customer experience by making customized commercial capabilities available and useful throughout the end-to-end process.

  

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to join our dynamic team in the Solution Configuration department. This is an exciting opportunity to be part of our digital transformation journey, working with cutting-edge technologies in configuration and constraint programming. You will contribute to the development of configuration support and play a key role in modeling and documenting complex logic and data.

 **What you will do:**

* Contribute to the development of our technology stack and solution configuration.
* Develop configuration support using constraint and algorithmic programming for execution in our systems.
* Drive modeling and documentation of complex logic and data.
* Ensure quality in code that is critical to our operations.
* Introduce innovative thinking and evaluate technology choices for future use cases.
* Collaborate with a team of highly competent colleagues.

 **The skills you bring:**

* University degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent education.
* Interest in modern software development projects.
* Knowledge in one or more major programming languages (e.g., Python).
* Critical thinking ability and research skills.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively.
* Proven ability and willingness to learn new skills quickly.
* Fluent in English, both spoken and written.

 **Preferred Skills:**

* Experience with Constraint Programming and tools such as MiniZinc and Google OR-Tools CP-SAT.
* Familiarity with SAP SSC and configuration engines.
* Understanding of complex systems, optimization, and declarative programming.
* Object modeling and information modeling skills.
* Experience in microservice design and cloud technologies.
* General knowledge of mobile network and systems architecture.
* Grasp of mathematical principles and models.
* Database modeling knowledge.
* GenAI (Generative AI) and ML skills
* Java and SQL skills

title: Senior Full-stack Web Developer
description:
Are you passionate about building scalable, future-ready applications? Do you have a keen eye for clean code, usability, and impactful user experiences? At our Växjö office, you’ll find more than just a workplace – you’ll join a close-knit group that values trust, collaboration, and professional growth.

### **What we offer:**

##### **Growth and Innovation**

* Biannual Hackathons: Three days of creativity and exploration.
* Monthly Lab Days: Work on anything you’re passionate about.
* Tech Days: Developer-focused deep dives into advanced topics.
* Annual Company Conference: A chance to recharge and connect with the entire team.

##### **Product-Centered Freedom**

  

We empower our teams to take ownership of their missions and deliver results in their own way. If you thrive in this kind of autonomy, you’ll fit right in.

##### **Perks and Benefits**

* Pension plan: ITP1 via Avanza, with salary exchange options.
* Private health insurance
* Wellness allowance
* 30 days of vacation
* Breakfasts, Hackathons, and team gatherings for everyday enjoyment.

##### **Our Växjö Culture**

* Flat organization where every voice is heard.
* 40 teammates, mostly developers.
* Hybrid work model
* Strong community spirit:
	+ Game nights, after-work hangouts, and shared meals.
	+ Daily coffee breaks and a lunch table for everyone – we love spending time together.
	+ A culture so strong that even those who’ve left often come back!
* No-shoe policy: Bring your best socks.

##### **Onboarding Done Right**


Our onboarding process is top-rated, ensuring you feel part of the team from day one, as is your code buddy who will guide you to our goal of "cracking the mobile experience".

### **What you will do:**

* Develop and maintain our backend services ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and scalability.
* Work closely with design to update existing or implement new front-end components to keep a maintainable frontend code-base.
* Using feature flags and other techniques to roll out new features smoothly and doing A/B tests to find the best approach
* Collaborate with other cross-functional teams for initiatives that cross several different areas.

### **What we are looking for:**

* **Extensive Experience:** Demonstrated success in software development, with a track record of delivering complex, high-quality web applications in collaboration with others.
* **Technical Proficiency:** Experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Go, Ruby, Node.js, and modern web development practices. Your knowledge is more important than the amount of years of experience.
* **Front-End Skills:** Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design; experience with design systems is a significant advantage.
* **Quick Learner:** Capable of rapidly understanding new systems to enhance existing functionality or implement new features.
* **Excellent Communication:** Clear and concise in both verbal and written communication, with the ability to collaborate seamlessly across teams.
* **Initiative Taker:** You see areas that can be improved both in the team and in the code and see it through that it gets done.

### **We hope that…**

* You are passionate about building great products that people love.
* You have a “can-do mentality,” but you are not afraid to ask questions and seek assistance from colleagues.
* You value teamwork and collaborative problem-solving, demonstrating good communication skills, empathy, and a team-first mindset.
* You embody our culture of bravery, humility, and transparency and are passionate about helping us achieve our goals. You understand the importance of curiosity, empower others, and build on a foundation of trust by sharing information openly and proactively.


We warmly welcome your application and look forward to getting to know you better!

title: Hardware Developer PCB Design
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


Printed Circuit Board (PCB) Design Team is a hardware development unit located in Product Development Unit Transport. As a PCB Design team, we take an end to end responsibility for PCB design and quality assurance from early phases in development projects and pre-development to maintenance of products installed in the field. We are taking lead on global PCB Technology and governance. We have close cooperation cross development sites and support with PCB Technology studies.  

  

We are now looking for a hardware developer with focus on Printed Circuit Board (PCB) design. You will work in close collaboration with radio-, digital-, mechanical-, thermal design, and production to develop high quality PCB´s for our products. Your role will include all development activities such as: requirement analysis, Product Lifecycle Management support and Technical Documentation of PCB´s. You will join a team focusing on PCB design using the tool Cadence Allegro and collaborate with multi-functional development teams in which continuous improvement, innovation and knowledge sharing is part of the daily work.

 **What you will do:**

* Design PCB using design tools from Cadence.
* Develop and analyze board floor plans
* Drive improvements in ways of working with PCB/PBA design
* Share knowledge with colleagues
* Work in projects in the PCB area

 **The skills you bring:**

* Understanding of PCB manufacturing processes
* Knowledge from Cadence design tools
* Problem solving mentality
* Good analytical skills
* Understanding of tele-communications and electrical design
* Understanding of mass production and statistics in design
* Understanding of thermal design
* Understanding of simulation tools for radio, signal and power integrity and thermal design
* Scripting in skills
* Excellent English in speech, reading and writing
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

title: Baseband developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------



Are you our next newly graduated, curious software professional to build our Baseband Software for 5G and 6G?

 **About this opportunity:**

  

We are currently seeking recent graduates to bolster our team!

  

When joining Ericsson, you are empowered to learn, lead and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology and you will have an opportunity to rotate between our different teams to build networks and learn more about technical domains. This is a place where you are welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.

  

Together with your team, you will be responsible for new functionality - from feature systemization to customer acceptance as well as maintenance of current products. The team systemize, design and test the software and take joint responsibility for all team tasks.

 **What you will do:**

  

Your focus will be in the Baseband SW – which is a vital part in our current market leading 5G Radio Access Network (RAN) solution. We are looking for people to expand our teams, focusing on either Physical Layer (L1) or Scheduler (L2). Looking forward, the teams will move into 6G as technology and standard progress.

  

Together with your fellow Baseband SW developers, you will:

* Build outstanding baseband software using C/C++, Python.
* Participate in the studies, implementation, and verification of new 5G features and upcoming 6G standard.
* Support and participate in innovation activities across organizations
* Work in a multi-functional, multi-cultural environment with supportive teammates.

 **The skills you bring:**

  

* Master of Science degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Wireless Communication, Electrical or Electronic Engineering or equivalent.
* Curiosity, a desire, and skills to be a great embedded software developer with a special interest in the C/C++ programming language for real time systems.
* A forward-thinking, focused and creative personality. We love extraordinary teammates who enjoy a fast-paced work environment and challenges.
* Dedication and a genuine interest in the latest technology trends.
* Passion to wrestle with problems no one else has solved before.

  

You have an open mind and like to take on new challenges to continuously improve, and to work outside your own field to broaden your competence and get a deeper understanding of our products. In addition, we value knowledge and experience in 5G and 4G wireless communication e.g. 3GPP specifications, traffic scheduling, signal processing, RF or air interface measurements, x86 or multi-core DSP programming or design patterns in a real-time embedded environment.

 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

title: Jr Product Developer to H&M Brand – open application!
description:
**Company Description**
 This is an open application for current and upcoming Junior Product Developer openings for all H&M Brand Business Units and Lifestyle Brands (Womenswear, Kids, Menswear, Divided, Beauty, MOVE and HOME).If you have a passion for fashion and love to do business and create growth, we want to meet you!
   

  

**Our Company**
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way.  Learn more about H&M here.
   

  

 The H&M Head Office is based in Stockholm, Sweden, where we design and develop our fashion collections for a wide variety of customers. H&M is a dynamic international workplace where high pace and rapid changes are a natural part of our day. Good communication skills, a flexible attitude and capacity to adapt to changes are essential. We have a sustainable mindset and always seek new ways to improve our sustainable working methods to achieve our goals. Together we offer fashion, design, and services that enable people to be inspired and to express their own personal style, making it easier to live in a more circular way.
   

  

**Job Description**
**Jr Product Developer**
 As a Jr Product Developer you will have an important role in the exciting and complex process of creating products for our collections to be sold in all our sales countries – all over the world. Together with a tight team, you work with identifying and developing collections according to current and upcoming global trends.
   

  

 Your main responsibility is to support the Product Developer, to develop our products for our customers. You will be an important link between Designers, Pattern Makers and Planners throughout the entire process and ensure everything runs smooth! Here you will get the chance to be part of our daily operational tasks, such as sample handling, as well as be involved in setting long-term goals for the team. You work as a project manager in a fast-paced environment where no day is the same
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Preferably minimum one year of experience from product development/ buying
* Education within Textiles/Buying/Product Development
* Result-oriented and a business growth mindset
* Have passion for fashion and products with a good sense of trends
* Having a structured way of working and good at taking initiatives
* A strong team player with great communication skills
* A prestigeless doer
* Curious to learn more and have a growth mindset


**Additional Information**
 If you feel your experience, skills and ambitions are right for this role, please send your application, including a CV. Interviews will be held continuously.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  

**Inclusion & Diversity**
 H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organization. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience, and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

 We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Backend Software Engineer (.NET Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 As a Backend Software Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Strong professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Mobile SDK development experience


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Software Engineer- Stockholm
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a
 **Software Engineer** 
 🚀**
**Job Type:** 
 Onsite
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

**Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our
 **Software Engineer****
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Vipas AB is looking for a skilled
 **Software Engineer** 
 to join our team in client location and contribute to the development and maintenance of an
 **Internal Developer Portal (IDP) - Backstage** 
 . In this role, you will work on designing, developing, and enhancing features, integrating third-party systems, and ensuring a stable, secure, and efficient environment for developers. You will collaborate closely with developers, architects, and infrastructure teams to drive continuous improvements.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain Backstage, an internal developer portal, including custom plugins and integrations.
* Ensure a stable, secure, and up-to-date installation.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements, provide feedback, and enhance the platform.
* Support onboarding services for new users and teams.
* Contribute to code quality improvements and maintain high development standards.
* Facilitate and participate in team discussions and problem-solving activities.


**Requirements**
* Proven experience in developing modern, cloud-based, containerized solutions.
* Strong JavaScript skills with expertise in React and Node.js.
* Experience working with relational databases, RESTful APIs, and GitHub.
* Ability to take ownership, demonstrate leadership, and think strategically about technology.
* Comfortable in team discussions and problem-solving sessions.


**Good To Have**
* Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and monitoring tools like Grafana or Splunk.
* Familiarity with Azure DevOps, YAML, Kubernetes, GraphQL, Terraform, and automated code analysis tools.
* Experience supporting onboarding services and plugin development.
* Knowledge of Developer Portals like Backstage.
* Azure certification is a plus.


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

**Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at sandhya@vipas.se**
**Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.**
**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
* Urval sker löpande
* Arbete på plats


 Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

**Vill du vara med och utveckla hur företag arbetar med försäljning med hjälp av den senaste tekniken, artificiell intelligens och användarvänlig design? Upsales revolutionerar CRM-branschen genom sin digitala plattform för B2B-säljare och företag. Med hjälp av AI-teknik automatiserar vi processer, analyserar data och skapar insikter som hjälper våra kunder att fatta smartare beslut. Börsnoterade Upsales växer så det knakar och med fokus på tech behöver vi skala vårt team ännu mer. Vi söker dig som vill vara en viktig del av en tillväxtresa och verkligen kunna påverka – på Upsales är du inte ett litet kugghjul i ett stort maskineri.**

**Om tjänsten** 
 Hos Upsales får du arbeta med de senaste teknologierna, inklusive AI, och ta stort eget ansvar. Du blir en del av ett tight gäng bestående av cirka 20 utvecklare. På Upsales jobbar vi tätt tillsammans men med stor frihet. Vårt mål är att utveckla en grym produkt med AI som en viktig komponent för att förbättra användarupplevelsen och optimera försäljningsprocesserna. Det finns inget klart recept på hur vi ska gå tillväga, istället jobbar vi fram lösningar både tillsammans och individuellt med fokus på kunderna och effektivitet i leveranser.
   

  

**Du erbjuds**
* Möjligheten att bygga en produkt med de senaste teknikerna, så som: React, Node.js, TypeScript, Figma.
* Bli en del av ett litet team , med korta beslutsvägar och stort utrymme att påverka.
* Vara med på Upsales tillväxtresa, där du får utvecklas med seniora kollegor.
* Remote Working – Upsales sitter på Vasagatan 16 i Stockholm – Efter provanställning finns möjlighet att arbeta remote två dagar i veckan.




**Utöver Detta Får Du Också**
* Omfattande introduktions- och karriärplan
* Mindfulness-konto och gym
* Frukost på kontoret varje morgon
* Två årliga kickoffs
* Konkurrenskraftigt kompensationspaket och sex veckors semester/år







**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Högskole- eller civilingenjörsexamen inom relevant område
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta som full stack developer i minst 3 år
* Arbetat med React och Node.js i minst 1 år
* Utmärkta kunskaper i svenska och engelska


**För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du är:**
* Driven och trivs i en start-up-miljö med högt tempo och mycket samarbete
* Analytisk med en god förmåga att se helheten och förstå affären
* Självgående och gillar att ta egna initiativ
* Kanske viktigast av allt, du är en hacker som är grym på programmering och älskar att hitta nya lösningar på problem!


**Övrigt/ansökan**
 Tjänsten är på heltid, tillsvidare och med placering på vårt kontor i Stockholm. Tillsättning sker så snart som möjligt.

title: Backend Java Developer to the Payment team
description:
Paf is a pioneering Nordic gaming company, founded on the Åland Islands in 1966 with a unique mission: to generate funds for the greater good of society. As one of the first gaming companies to launch online in 1999, we continue to lead the industry with innovative, exclusive games developed by our in-house Games Studio.
 



 Committed to creating a safer gaming environment, we are proud to be an award-winning leader in responsible gaming, setting new standards that put players first.
 







  





  

**THE TEAM**




 This role places you in the payment team, consisting of six highly experienced and skilled developers, where openness and everyone's contributions and opinions are valued.
 



 You will participate in the entire development lifecycle of the payment platform, from requirements analysis to deployment and maintenance. You will leverage your Java expertise to influence architectural decisions and understand their long-term implications.
 



 Additionally, you will collaborate on developing a robust, secure, and scalable payment platform, focusing exclusively on backend development.
 







  





**YOUR PROFILE**
 You thrive in an environment where deep technical discussions and problem-solving are at the core of daily work. While collaboration is important, your main drive comes from exploring complex systems, writing high-quality code, and continuously deepening your technical expertise. You enjoy diving into the details, learning new technologies, and engaging with like-minded colleagues who share a passion for software development at a deep technical level.
 



 Seen to the technical aspects, you have at least 2 years of experience as a
 **Java developer** 
 with working experience from:
   




* Modern
 **Java** 
 and
 **Spring Boot** 
 .
* **Kafka** 
 and
 **PostgreSQL** 
 .
* **AWS** 
 or other cloud platforms.



*Additional skills that make you stand out from the crowd:*



* Knowledge of
 **Open Banking** 
 and
 **PSD2 regulations** 
 , reflecting an understanding of the latest standards in financial technology.
* Prior experience in the
 **payment processing domain** 
 .



  





 Formal education and diplomas are not our main priority, a lot can be compensated with:
   




* Good communication skills.
* Track record as a team player.
* Independence.
* Accountability.
* Experience and knowledge within the field.



  









**WE OFFER** 



* A company with steady growth since it's founding in 1966.
* Occupational healthcare and insurance.
* A culture of care, creativity and collaboration
* A workplace that encourages individuality and personal growth.
* A strong focus on well-being over short-term goals, valuing sustained contributions and work-life balance. We strive to avoid overtime unless absolutely necessary.
* A hybrid remote arrangement, including coverage for your Wi-Fi and home office setup.







**INFORMATION** 




**Start Date:** 
 As soon as possible, subject to notice period requirements.
 



**Duration:** 
 Full-time/Permanent with a six-month probation period.
 



**Remote work/location:** 
 Requirement of being in the office for a few days per week.
 


* **In Stockholm:** 
 A modern and vibrant co-working office with a 9th-floor view at
 *United Spaces,* 
 Klarabergsviadukten 63. Including weekly breakfasts, afterworks, Gym, yoga-classes, events and a lot more.
* **In Marie** 
**hamn:** 
 Our headquarters in Mariehamn offers a light, open and modern building. 120+ Paf Employees are based here, engaging over weekly breakfasts, seminars, events and an office gym, in-house massage, free use of bikes and plenty other benefits.



  









**Application:** 
 Applications are only accepted via the application form. Due to GDPR compliance, we cannot accept applications via email.
 



 We are actively reviewing applications and will close the position once the right candidate is found.
 



**Recruitment Process:** 
 The process includes a programming assessment.

title: Software Engineer - Fullstack
description:
**Why is this role important**
 We’re building the world’s largest, most capable, and performant data platform for Marketing Intelligence. We have accomplished a lot, but we’re still early in our journey. Now, we are looking for Software Engineers to help us tackle the challenges ahead. If you’re curious to learn more about our data platform, here’s a blog post from our CTO.
   

  

*Our engineering department*
 We put a strong emphasis on team collaboration, we work in cross-functional teams, where you are not handed requirements, but rather problems to solve. Our Engineering teams have clear ownership and room to make decisions and priorities for our product. You engage and take responsibility for your part of the product with your peers. Learning is central to us. We work with small iterations and deploy to production several times a day.
   

  

**What You'll Be Doing**
 You will work with both frontend and backend and be responsible for everything from implementation to deployment and monitoring and we expect you to follow engineering best practices.
   

  

 We currently have several openings across the organization, focusing on areas like product navigation, onboarding, and platform connections. The whole product development department works from our central office in Stockholm to make it easier to collaborate.
   

  

**Our Tech Stack**
* Javascript/TypeScript
* Node
* React
* Microservice architecture in AWS


**What We're Looking For**
* 4+ years experience working as a developer in, at least parts of, our tech stack.
* Proficiency in both frontend and backend but might be more passionate about either.
* Knowledge in cloud development (we use AWS) and infrastructure.
* Interest and experience in thinking of scalability, security and reliability.
* Hands-on experience in agile teams and ways of working.
* Fluency in English.


**What You'll Bring**
 You're humble and you're not afraid to make important decisions. You see challenges as opportunities for growth, embrace learning, and persist in the face of setbacks.
   

  

 You have a strong drive for customer satisfaction, and you want to contribute to the success of your team! You understand how things work together and you can figure out solutions when things get complicated.
   

  

 You believe that the best solutions come from teamwork, where diverse perspectives and open communication is key. You enjoy collaborating within and across teams, as well as with adjacent departments such as design, product, and customers.
   

  

**Benefits & Perks**
 We offer a competitive salary along with great benefits.
   

  

 → Take a look at our Funnel benefits here!
   

  

**About**
 Funnel is the leading Marketing Intelligence platform that empowers marketers to automatically collect, model, visualize, and analyze data from over 500 marketing platforms—without the need for SQL or scripting. Now equipped with measurement, Funnel combines Marketing Mix Modelling, Multi Touch Attribution, and Incrementality Testing to triangulate the true effectiveness of marketing efforts and provide smart, data-driven suggestions.
   

  

 Trusted by more than 2,000 businesses worldwide, including globally recognized brands such as Adidas and Sony, Funnel generated over $50M in ARR in 2023 and continues to feature in the FT 1000 list of Europe’s fastest-growing companies.
   

  

 Since its founding in 2014, Funnel has grown into a global team of over 300 employees, with offices in Stockholm, Boston, Dublin, London, Hamburg, and Sydney.
   

  

**Additional Information**
**Inclusiveness**
 Industry research shows that women and those in traditionally underrepresented groups generally don’t apply to jobs unless they check all the boxes for the role. If you feel you have what it takes for this role but don’t check 100% of the boxes—that’s okay—we encourage you to apply anyway and highlight what you can bring to the table.
   

  

**Office first**
 At Funnel, we have an office-first approach, and we work from the office a minimum of four days a week. We have lots of flexibility for when life happens, during the summer, through the holidays however, we avoid having standing remote days.
   

  

**Relocation**
 For this role we are not considering applicants who require relocation and will take into consideration only applicants who are located in Stockholm, and:
   

  

* Hold Swedish citizenship
* Hold EU/EEA citizenship
* Have a valid work permit for working in Sweden


 Funnel is a SaaS product designed to help marketing teams own their performance. Founded in 2014 in Stockholm, and still founder-led, the Funnel team has grown with our customers – serving more than 2,000 companies from our Stockholm, Boston, Dublin, Hamburg and Sydney offices. We value increased in-person collaboration, and as such, we work a minimum of four days a week from our offices.
   

  

 We have always put the customer first, expressed in a no-commission sales model and a customer-centric development approach. We are proud to help companies such as Havas Media, Adidas, Sony, and Home Depot to unlock the true impact of their data.

title: Back End Developer
description:
**Responsibilities** 
  
 


* Develop and maintain backend services and APIs for:






**Account Management** 
 – User authentication, role-based access control, and security best practices. 
 





**Project Management** 
 – Handling user projects, collaboration features, and version control. 
 





**Machine Management** 
 – Managing connected devices, data synchronization, and status monitoring. 
 





**Model Upload** 
 – Enabling seamless upload and storage of 3D models and large files. 
 





**File Syncing** 
 – Ensuring data consistency across multiple devices in real-time. 
 





**Cross-Version Compatibility** 
 – Implementing robust solutions for backward and forward compatibility. 
 





**Payment Systems** 
 – Integrating secure payment gateways and subscription management. 
 


* Optimize database performance and implement scalable architecture.
* Collaborate with frontend developers, designers, and product managers to ensure a seamless user experience.
* Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
* Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests
* Implement security measures and best practices to protect user data.
* Management of hosting environment, including database administration and scalability



  





**Qualifications** 
  
 


* Strong experience with backend development using Node.js, Next.js, Python, Ruby, Java, or Go.
* Proficiency in working with SQL/NoSQL databases
* Experience with RESTful APIs, WebSockets and microservices architecture.
* Experience with user authentication protocols and authorization across multiple systems
* Knowledge of cloud services (AWS, GCP, Azure) and containerization tools like Docker/Kubernetes.
* Familiarity with DevOps, CI/CD pipelines and automated deployment processes.
* Experience with version control systems like Git
* Knowledge of session management in a distributed server environment
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in an agile development environment.



  





**Preferred Qualifications** 
  
 


* Experience with real-time data synchronization across devices.
* Prior work with payment integrations.
* Understanding of cross-platform file compatibility challenges and solutions.
* Experience with Unity mobile app development.



  





**Who is TERNA** 
  
 



 At TERNA, innovation is at the core of everything we do. Our flagship product is an Android application assisting individual operators and machines to work more productively through sophisticated GNSS (Global Navigation Satellite System) based 3D solutions elevating construction to the next level and connecting entire fleets in real time. What sets us apart is our commitment to excellence in every aspect of what we do. We’ve developed our own Inertial Measurement Units (IMUs) from scratch, handling everything from electrical design to firmware development, testing, calibration, and mechanical design in-house. Our combined software and hardware solutions offer an impressive accuracy and, unparalleled precision and reliability. As we continue to grow in a rapidly expanding global market, we’re looking for passionate individuals who thrive in fast-paced environments and are eager to make a meaningful impact. Join us on this exciting journey as we push the boundaries of innovation and drive our continued path towards the digitalized and resourceful work site. 
 



  
 



**What we offer** 
  
 


* Fast-paced environment with rapid growth and expansion opportunities where every day brings new challenges and learning experiences.
* High-energy team driving towards ambitious goals.
* Training and development, access to courses and training, fosters continuous learning and personal growth.
* Health and wellness benefits, financial support for maintaining a healthy and active lifestyle for physical well-being.
* ITP Tjänstepension, supplementary pension plan for retirement savings.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Frontend Developer @Mavatar** 




 Tänk dig en vård där varje behandling är skräddarsydd efter patientens unika biologi – det är vad vi på Mavatar arbetar mot. För att nå dit utvecklar vi två innovativa produkter: ett verktyg för precisionsmedicin och ett annat för att effektivisera läkemedelsforskning. Nu söker vi utvecklare till DevTeamet!
 



  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi söker dig som är en frontendutvecklare med erfarenhet av att att utforma tydliga och responsiva gränssnitt, samt som trivs med att arbeta nära vår designer och andra utvecklare i teamet. Hos oss får du chansen att arbeta med ny teknik och vara med från start när vi bygger våra två produkter.
 



 Det här jobbar vårt team med:
 


* React
* TypeScript
* Tailwind
* Komponentbibliotek
* .Net, C#
* Docker
* Microservice architecture
* Azure DevOps



  





**Hur är det att jobba hos oss?** 




 Vi är ett litet och engagerat team som jobbar nära varandra. Här får du både stöd för att utvecklas och möjlighet att växa i takt med företaget och våra produkter. På sikt kan du också ta ett större ansvar och forma din roll. Vi är ett hybridteam som är på plats på kontoret i centrala Stockholm 2-3 dagar i veckan.
 



 Vår vision är att skapa ett smidigt och agilt arbetssätt inom en sektor som ofta anses vara icke-agil. Vi använder den senaste relevanta tekniken för att bygga stabila och moderna produkter.
 



  





**Precisionsmedicin** 




 Vårt AlgoritmTeam skapar medicinska avatarer som förutspår hur olika mediciner påverkar olika patienter. Genom detta bidrar vi till mer precis och effektiv vård, där rätt behandling kan sättas in direkt och onödiga behandlingar kan undvikas. Som en del av DevTeamet kommer du att utveckla plattformen som gör de medicinska avatarerna till en skalbar och användarvänlig produkt.
 



  





**Forskningsverktyget** 




 Vårt PharmaTeam arbetar med att samla in stora mängder forskningsdata. Genom att sammanställa resultat från olika studier genereras ny information som skapar värdefulla riktlinjer för framtida forskning. Som en del av DevTeamet kommer du att utveckla produkten som gör det möjligt för forskare att effektivt söka och navigera i denna omfattande datamängd.
 



  





**Ansökningsprocess och kontakt** 




 Ansökningar hanteras omgående så vänta inte med att söka! Har du frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Christian Saeby, Engineering Lead, via e-post: christian.saeby@mavatar.com. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
 



  





  





 -------------------------------------
 



  





**Frontend Developer @ Mavatar** 




 Imagine a healthcare system where every treatment is tailored to a patient's unique biology—that's what we at Mavatar are working towards. To achieve this, we are developing two innovative products: a tool for precision medicine and another to streamline pharmaceutical research. Now, we are looking for developers to join our DevTeam!
   





**Who are you?** 




 We are looking for a frontend developer with experience in designing clear and responsive user interfaces. You should enjoy working closely with our designer and other developers in the team. With us, you’ll have the opportunity to work with the latest technologies and be part of the journey as we build our two products from the ground up.
 



  





**Our tech stack includes:** 



* React
* TypeScript
* Tailwind
* Component libraries
* .Net, C#
* Docker
* Microservice architecture
* Azure DevOps



  





**What it's like to work with us** 




 We are a small and dedicated team that collaborates closely. Here, you will receive support for your professional development and the opportunity to grow alongside the company and our products. Over time, you can take on more responsibility and shape your role.
 



 We work in a hybrid setup, spending 2-3 days a week at our office in central Stockholm. Our vision is to create a smooth and agile workflow in a sector that is often seen as non-agile. We use the latest relevant technologies to build stable and modern products.
 



  





**Precision Medicine** 




 Our Algorithm Team creates medical avatars that predict how different medications affect different patients. This contributes to more precise and effective healthcare, allowing the right treatment to be administered immediately while avoiding unnecessary interventions. As part of the DevTeam, you will develop the platform that turns these medical avatars into a scalable and user-friendly product.
 



  





**The Research Tool** 




 Our Pharma Team collects large amounts of research data. By compiling results from various studies, new insights are generated that create valuable guidelines for future research. As part of the DevTeam, you will develop the product that enables researchers to efficiently search and navigate this vast dataset.
 



  





**Application Process & Contact** 




 Applications are reviewed continuously, so don’t wait to apply! If you have any questions about the position or the recruitment process, feel free to contact
 **Christian Saeby, Engineering Lead** 
 , via email at
 **christian.saeby@mavatar.com** 
 .
 



 We look forward to hearing from you!

title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER - Dubai, UAE
description:
**Important Note:** 
 This role is advertised globally; however, the job location is as specified in the job description.
   

  

  

  

**Employment Type:** 
 Full-time & Permanent
   

  

**Location:** 
 Dubai, UAE
   

  

 Starting salary range of
 **60** 
****,** 
 000 USD to 75,000 USD per annum** 
 in a zero-tax environment.
   

  

**About Cobblestone Energy**
 Cobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the European Gas and Power markets. Established in 2017, we are shaping the future of global commodity trading with a focus on deep analytics. Our success is driven by our people, whom we back with real responsibility from the start. At Cobblestone Energy, excellence is valued and extraordinary talent from around the world is welcomed. Our flat organisational structure encourages a culture of innovation, granting team members autonomy and ownership of their work.
   

  

**Cobblestone Values**
* Lifelong learning with continuous reflection
* Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas
* The team is more important than the individual.
* Relentless pursuit of excellence
* Hiring and keeping only the most effective people
* Others must benefit from our existence.


**Job description** 
  

  

 At Cobblestone Energy we are on a mission to build the most advanced European electricity trading and analytics platform, with our technology being used by our teams of commercial traders to create significant value. We are looking for enthusiastic and resourceful developers who are passionate about building exceptionally reliable and performance data processing solutions. You want to help the commercial team make data-informed decisions, have a curious mindset, and are motivated to understand our business better. Developing a strong domain knowledge of our industry over time is key to long term success in this role.
   

  

 If you have excellent programming skills, strong problem-solving skills, and a passion for developing and improving applications utilizing cutting edge technologies, then we would like to meet you.
   

  

**What we offer in this role** 
  

  

* Competitive remuneration, with fast progression for strong performers.
* A challenging but exciting, open, and fun work environment.
* An opportunity to work with remarkably talented colleagues.
* Vast growth potential in every aspect.
* 15% target bonus with further upside.
* Employee share scheme participation
* International relocation support
* Opportunity to be embedded within a commercial team for those with strong commercial interest


**Responsibilities** 
  

  

* Write software applications and programs for backend/frontend purposes.
* Analyse programs and apps to improve their features and functionalities.
* Test & debug programs and fix any reported bugs.
* Collaborate with the tech team to improve the performance, efficiency, and scalability of our tools.


**Requirements** 
  

  

* BS/BE in Computer Science/Computer Engineering.
* Programming experience of 1 to 2 years in Python language.
* Expertise in at least one popular Python framework (like Django, Flask ...).
* Experience of 1 to 2 years in front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS, JQuery, JS, ...etc.
* Knowledge of APIs and webservices.
* Knowledge of Relational Databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server ...) and SQL language.
* Knowledge of NoSQL databases is a plus.
* Knowledge of AWS is a plus / Knowledge of data visualization tools, mainly Tableau, is a plus.
* Ability to work in a team environment.
* Strong problem-solving skills and analytical skills.
* Resilience and a determination to succeed.
* Independent thinkers with growth mindset.
* Must be passionate, self-motivated, and able to learn quickly.
* Strong sense of integrity.
* Personal values that match our company values.

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**Expleo** 
 is seeking a highly skilled and experienced
 **Fullstack Developer** 
 to join our team in
 **Sweden** 
 (located in Gothenburg OR Stockholm).
   

  

 Our
 **ideal** 
 candidate has an always-on mindset with a strong background in designing, configuring, and managing solutions for devices, tools, and applications in a factory/corporate setting.
   

  

 If you are a full-stack engineer looking to expand your skill set, we'd love to hear from you. Join our team today and take the next step in your career!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Understand and reflect on the customer needs to bring value to the organization.
* Take part in the development cycle using innovative technologies and frameworks.
* Secure qualitative, efficient and performance deliveries.
* Provide input for the design and construction of test cases and scenarios and help validate executed test results.
* Contribute to boosting the team to continually increase knowledge, competence, performance, and innovation
* Collaborate with suppliers, architects, engineers, developers, and internal stakeholders on upcoming and innovative technologies and standardization.
* Collaborate with the local IT site teams for problem/opportunity analysis.


**Qualifications**
* Hold a bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science or equivalent experience in a relevant field.
* Knowledge and experience in agile development practices, ITIL (incident, problem & change process), collaboration tools (such as Azure DevOps or similar)
* Java development & support, relational databases (Oracle, SQL server, My SQL).
* Eager to learn and grow (yourself and the company) using a modern approach to Software Engineering.
* Ability to work under rapidly changing conditions and have the capability to identify, mitigate and decide on solutions when facing obstacles.
* You are fluent in English, both verbally and written.
* You should have a general understanding of production processes and understand how all these things work together to make end user applications work well.
* Knowledge of the automotive industry is meritorious.


**Experience**
* Knowledge about databases (MS SQL (Azure))
* Development platforms (Java, OpenShift, ...)
* Azure Cloud (App services, AKS Azure Kubernetes Cluster)
* SQL server for database
* Azure Storage, Azure Container Services
* Frameworks (Spring, Springboot, WebFlux, ...)
* Messaging (MQ, Kafka, REST API, ...)
* Front-end (Angular)
* Test Driven Development (Unit testing in Spring Boot and Angular, in memory database testing using Mockito)
* Agile processes (Safe / Scrum / ADO) but also about backlog management, strategic planning, business relationship management, problem analysis and business modelling.
* Bonus points for having relevant experience using docker containers and orchestration with Kubernetes.


**Benefits**
**Who are we?**
 Expleo is a rapidly growing consulting company dedicated to delivering innovative solutions in the fields of AI engineering, digitalization, hyper-automation, cybersecurity, and data science. With a strong commitment to integrity, diversity, sustainability, and societal security, Expleo is at the forefront of creating a better future. Join our dynamic team and be part of our journey to shape the future of technology and business.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
* Collaborative working environment – we stand shoulder to shoulder with our clients and our peers through good times and challenges
* We empower all passionate technology loving professionals by allowing them to expand their skills and take part in inspiring projects
* Expleo Academy - enables you to acquire and develop the right skills by delivering a suite of accredited training courses
* Always working as one team, our people are not afraid to think big and challenge the status quo
* Collective agreement with the union
* Access to a collection of benefits and discounted prices on services and shops.
* Health benefits
* Expleo team activities


 "We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age ”.

title: Next Generation: Junior Developer
description:
We are actively seeking the next wave of tech talent through our NextGen graduate initiative in Stockholm. This opportunity is for recent graduates with 0-3 years of experience who are eager to launch a meaningful career in technology. Although we have an exceptional team in place, we are always focused on building for the future. If you're ready to make an impact, this is your chance to join us.
   

  

 Join our Team
   

  

**About This Opportunity**
 The Engineering Unit Cloud RAN within Business Unit Networks seeks to work closely with our customers, passionate about the delivery of virtualized Radio Access Network (RAN) solutions. We work with:
   

  

* Full stack virtualization of the 5G New Radio (NR) Control Unit (CU) and Digital Unit (DU).
* COTS HW.
* Cloud Native infrastructure.
* Open interfaces (e.g F1, X2/Xn, A1, 01, LLS…).
* Architecture for automation, AI and machine learning.


 We try to accelerate the product development with fresh thinking. We challenge the established flow with new methodologies and are active in the open-source communities.
   

  

 We are now looking for enthusiastic and skilled Junior Developers to join the team!
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Actively participate in the software development for Cloud Native baseband products for our vDU.
* Be able to deliver scalability, resilience and performance by taking full advantage of the evolving architecture and services inherent to a Cloud Native Platform.
* Strive for delivery of product and test code with all the advantages of a DevOps infrastructure.


**The Skills You Will Bring**
* Solid skills in one of the following programming languages: C/C++.
* Talent and passion for software development, problem solving and computer systems. You love to discuss software and are comfortable about sharing this knowledge.
* A collaborative approach that makes you a phenomenal teammate.
* Good communication and presentation skills.
* BSc level (MSc preferred) in a SW related field.
* An ability to develop and deploy the Embedded type of SW, on a COTS HW.
* Understand concepts like Docker containers, Kubernetes deployment, Helm charts and canary deployment.
* Knowledge in 5G NR and LTE 3GPP standards.


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 757617

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Want to be part of building the future of Sales for companies everywhere?
 

 Join Agaton - Where AI Meets Human Communication!
 

  






 At Agaton, we spearhead a revolution in Sales by empowering sales agents to excel through automated personalized coaching powered by advanced AI technology.
 




  






 We are on a mission to shape the future of sales for businesses globally, and we need talented individuals like you to join our amazing team of machine learning engineers, software developers, designers and more in our Stockholm office.
 




  






 Imagine being part of a company that has transformed the skills and careers of countless sales professionals worldwide. At Agaton, we're not just imagining a more connected and effective sales force – we're making it a reality!
 




  






 Our state-of-the-art AI technology is redefining how sales professionals learn to communicate with confidence and precision in every interaction.
 




  






 As we continue to lead the AI-driven evolution in sales training and communication skills, we're looking for innovative minds to join us in pushing the boundaries of what's achievable. 
 




  





  





  





**What you'll be doing 🚀** 




  




* Design, develop, and maintain robust, scalable, and high-performance applications across the full stack, using modern technologies.
* Lead the architecture and implementation of complex software solutions, ensuring best practices in code quality, testing, and performance.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and machine learning engineers, to deliver features that align with business goals and customer needs.
* Optimize and maintain cloud infrastructure, leveraging AWS, Azure and GCP services to ensure high availability, scalability, and security.
* Participate in code reviews, mentoring, and knowledge sharing to foster a strong engineering culture.
* Identify and troubleshoot issues in production, implementing solutions to prevent recurrence and improve system reliability.
* Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies, proposing innovative solutions to enhance our product offerings.



  





  





**What we're looking for 🤩** 




  




* Proven experience as a Senior Software Engineer with a strong background in full stack development.
* Proficiency in Python, with a solid understanding of software design patterns and best practices.
* Hands-on experience with cloud platforms, particularly AWS and GCP, including deploying and managing applications.
* Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to tackle complex technical challenges and deliver effective solutions.
* Familiarity with modern frontend frameworks and technologies (React, Next.js, etc.) is a plus.
* Experience leading engineering teams or mentoring junior developers is highly desirable.
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
* A proactive, self-driven mindset with a passion for continuous learning and improvement.
* Bonus: Experience in AI, machine learning, or data-driven products.



  





  





**What do we offer? 👀** 




  




* Competitive salary & equity package
* Mobile phone reimbursement
* Six weeks annual paid vacation
* Wellness budget
* Learning & development budget



  






 This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.
 




  





  





  





**About Agaton AI** 




  






 Agaton AI, based in Stockholm, develops secure, ethically-driven AI solutions for Sales and CX automation, prioritizing responsible AI and user privacy. Agaton provides a secure AI-powered sales solution that emphasizes data protection.
 




  






 The team previously built and held leadership roles at industry champions like Tink, Spotify, Shopify, Zettle by PayPal, Sana and EF. We’re now building a new category leader in AI, solving an age-old, trillion-dollar problem for businesses globally.
 




  






 Agaton is located in Stockholm, Sweden and is backed by a global group of prominent tech entrepreneurs and investors.
 




  






 www.agaton.ai
