title: Game Test Engineer
description:
**Join an Award-Winning Team!**  

  

We’re a recognized, award-winning company known for our outstanding work and company culture. At Just For The Win you’ll be surrounded by talented, supportive colleagues who genuinely enjoy working together. We believe in collaboration, innovation, and creating an environment where everyone can thrive. If you’re looking for a workplace that values both professional growth and great team spirit, we’d love to have you on board!  

  

**Job Overview:**


As a QA Tester, you will play a critical role in the development of our online slot games by identifying bugs, ensuring game mechanics function correctly, and verifying that our games provide a seamless player experience.


You will collaborate closely with a highly skilled team of game designers, developers, and artists to maintain quality throughout the production pipeline.  

  

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Conduct thorough testing of online slot games across various platforms.
* Identify, document, and track bugs using bug-tracking tools.
* Perform functional, regression, and exploratory testing.
* Validate game mechanics, animations, sound effects, and user interfaces.
* Ensure compliance with industry regulations and studio quality standards.
* Work closely with developers to troubleshoot and resolve issues.
* Assist in developing and maintaining test plans, scripts, and automated test cases.

Provide feedback on gameplay experience, usability, and overall performance.  
* 

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor degree in Computer science or similar, or at least 3 years of experience as a Software Test Engineer (experience in the online slot games industry is a plus).
* Strong understanding of game development processes and QA methodologies.
* Experience with bug-tracking tools (e.g., JIRA, TestRail, or similar).
* Ability to write clear and concise bug reports.
* Familiarity with different testing techniques, including functional and exploratory testing.
* Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Passion for gaming and understanding of player behavior.  
* 

**Bonus Skills:**

* Experience testing RNG-based games.
* Knowledge of compliance testing for gaming regulations.

Familiarity with scripting or automation testing tools. Understanding of UI/UX principles in gaming.  
* 

**What we offer**

* Work in a collaborative dynamic company
* Hybrid work opportunity
* Opportunity to influence the quality of the products, improve the process and implement your ideas
* 30 paid vacation days per year
* Pension plan
* Professional growth

Conferences, events and team building  
* 

**All applicants must be eligible to work in Sweden.**

*Just For The Win is an award-winning game studio founded in 2016. It employs 50+ creative, professional, and inspirational people in its fields, representing over 15 nationalities. Just For The Win has been awarded the Gasell by Dagens Industri, two years in a row, and the Sweden Tech Fast 50 by Deloitte for being one of the fastest-growing companies in Sweden.*

title: Growth Marketing Manager
description:
**Juni who?**  

At Juni, we’re busy building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.  

  

**How & why we do it**  

We give our people the same thing we’re building for our customers: freedom. Freedom to be 100% yourself. Freedom to explore your potential and what’s more – make the most of it. We truly believe we’re making the world a better place for online businesses, and we want you to be a part of that mission.

**Your role at a glance ‍️**

  

As Growth Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for developing and executing innovative marketing campaigns across multiple channels. You will be a key player in shaping our Communications & Marketing strategy and will work closely with the Sales and Product teams to achieve our ambitious growth goals. A core focus of this role will be ownership of the company website and email marketing strategy.


**Responsibilities**

Develop and implement data-driven growth marketing strategies across various channels, in line with company strategy and departmental goals


* **Website Ownership:**
	+ Own and manage the company website, including content updates, design improvements, and SEO optimisation.
	+ Collaborate with our designers and developers to implement website changes and track website performance metrics (e.g., traffic, conversion rates, bounce rate).
	+ Conduct UX research and testing to optimise website usability and conversion.
* **Email Marketing:**
	+ Develop and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads, drive conversions, and improve customer retention - working in close collaboration with our Commercial team
	+ Manage the email marketing platform and create automated email sequences.
	+ Segment email lists and personalise email content to maximise engagement.
	+ Analyse email campaign performance and optimise open rates, click-through rates, and conversion rates.
* **Lead Generation (Contact Acquisition & Enrichment):**
	+ Develop and implement strategies to acquire high-quality leads through various channels (e.g., webinars, contact lists, contact sourcing).
	+ Implement contact enrichment processes to gather additional information about leads and improve lead qualification.
	+ Research and evaluate lead generation tools and platforms.
	+ Collaborate with the Sales team and target lead acquisition efforts accordingly.
	+ Track and report on lead generation metrics, including lead volume, quality, and conversion rates.
	+ Manage marketing budgets effectively and allocate resources strategically.
	+ Collaborate with the other members of the Comms & Marketing to create compelling and engaging content that drives traffic and conversions.
	+ Identify and evaluate new marketing technologies and platforms.
	+ Stay up-to-date on the latest growth marketing trends and best practices.
	+ Contribute to the overall Comms & Marketing strategy and brand building efforts.

**Qualifications**

*What we need to see*

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
* 3-5 years of experience in growth marketing or a similar role.
* Native or business level fluency in Swedish and English are a must.
* Experience in fintech/finance/banking/accounting is a must.
* Proven track record of developing and executing successful growth marketing campaigns.
* Strong experience in website management, including content management systems (CMS), SEO, and UX optimisation.
* Proficiency in email marketing platforms (e.g., HubSpot) and automation tools.
* Strong analytical skills and experience with data analysis tools (e.g., Google Analytics).
* Proficiency in various marketing platforms and technologies (e.g., Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, CRM systems).
* Excellent communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills.
* Creative problem-solver with a passion for growth and innovation.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

*What we’d love to see*

* Basic understanding of HTML and CSS is a plus.
* Proficiency in multiple languages and international marketing experience is a plus.
* 

**Tooling ️**

* Asana
* Hubspot
* Webflow
* Ad platforms
* Slack
* G-suite

**Your people**

Our team is as ambitious as our amazing customers. We aim high and we move with speed to make our vision a reality. We care deeply about building a better future for our customers and each other. Here, you can work with people at the top of their game and who didn’t get there by playing games. You can help us create a whole new category in financial services.

**Your benefits**

We’re freedom-first. Transparent. Caring. Empowering. So our benefits are too.

* **We work hybrid.** We'll see you in one of our offices in Stockholm or Gothenburg at least two days per week.
* **Swap 2D for 3D**. Meet all Junis IRL at the company onsite each year.
* **Diversity is at our core**. We're part Swedish. Part Canadian. Part French. Part Indian. Part Italian. Part British. Part Portuguese. You get the idea.
* **Great players can stay great players**. Progress your career whether you choose to manage people or not.
* **Stock options**. We can’t promise you’ll make a fortune. But we’ll give it our very best shot.
* **Vacation days**. 30 days, awesome!
* **Private Health insurance**. You know. Just in case
* **Beautiful offices** in central Gothenburg and Stockholm, front row sea view!

title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
**Fullstack Developer to Taigatech**

**About Taigatech**


At Taigatech, we are revolutionizing the wood industry with cutting-edge AI and computer vision solutions. Our mission is to improve resource utilization and efficiency, thus, to contribute to a more sustainable future. Since our start in 2020, we’ve grown into a highly skilled team of engineers and AI experts, collaborating closely with sawmills across Nordics and Baltics.


Our technologies combine classic computer vision and 3D reconstruction with modern neural networks. With a close connection to the latest research in the field and a talented team, we aim to build sophisticated, high-quality solutions for complex industrial problems. Our current solutions are directly integrated into machines to make a real difference. Thus, we emphasize building robust, high-quality, and maintainable code.


As of now, the timber industry is experiencing a technological upswing to meet the increasing demand for environmentally friendly materials while ensuring the best possible raw material yield and efficiency. Taigatech’s solutions align perfectly with this trend by improving yield, increasing uptime, and ensuring that the correct material is used for the right purpose. We are now on a growth journey and want to strengthen our team with a Fullstack Developer.

**The Role**


We’re looking for an ambitious and versatile Fullstack Developer that enjoys working with customer implementations and leading software deliveries. The day-to-day involves product development, customer integration and analyzing the results of our systems. We believe that you like to collaborate with the customer, are inspired by complex systems, and have a feel for tasteful front-end.


You will:

* Work closely with developers and AI engineers to improve, develop and deliver the solutions to our customers.
* Improve and develop frontend architecture, ensuring robustness and maintainability.
* Help shape the technical direction and lead frontend development efforts.
* Be an essential player in customer projects and implementations, bug-fixes and overall improvements of our software.

**Who You Are**

* Experience of building and shipping high-quality applications.
* Experience of working in the intersection of front-end and back
* A startup mindset – you thrive in a fast-paced environment and enjoy taking initiative.
* Interest for AI, computer vision, and data-driven solutions.
* Like being versatile and open to learning new things.
* Fluency in English (Swedish is a plus).


Bonus points if you have:

* Experience of working on industrial applications or other robust, machine-close systems.
* Experience of working in C++ or similar languages.
* An interest in UI/UX design.
* Analytical and have a feeling for interpreting various data.
* Background in machine learning or AI-powered applications.

**Why Join Us?**

* Work with state-of-the-art AI technology in a fast-growing company.
* Be part of a tight-knit, ambitious team with a fun and collaborative culture.
* Influence product direction and architecture – make a real impact.
* Office-first culture in central Gothenburg, with flexibility for remote work when needed.
* The chance to travel and see your work in action at customer sites.
* A role with high autonomy and responsibility, shaping the future of AI in the wood industry.
* Work for a sustainable product that contribute to improved sustainability and productivity


For this recruitment, we are using our recruitment partner Detechtiv. Please contact NAME at **Adam@detechtiv.se** or 070 441 76 46 for more information.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining a scalable and intuitive frontend. This will be done in close collaboration with UX designers, backend developers, and users to create a smooth and user-friendly experience.


As a senior engineer, you take responsibility for the quality of the frontend delivery and contribute to a strong engineering culture within the team.

 **Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

* Expertise in frontend technologies, architecture and best practices
* Strong emphasis on high-quality clean, maintainable and testable code
* Experience in cross-functional collaboration with UX designers, back-end engineers and users.
* Proficient in working with design systems, both implementing and using them.
* Understand testing at all levels (unit, component, end-to-end).
* Good understanding of authentication and identity providers (IdPs).

  

  

**Technologies:**

* Frontend: HTTP, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, React, Tailwind
* Backend: REST APIs, Node.js, OpenAPI Spec, JSON Schema, database design (document- based preferred, relational beneficial), Docker, Kubernetes

 **Application deadline:** 13-02-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Innehålls- och konceptutvecklare
description:
I rollen kommer du att arbeta fram innehåll och koncept i våra kundprojekt. Du har ett nära samarbete med kunden för att förstå deras behov och målgrupp. Det är en iterativ process där du kommer med förslag och kunden tycker till. Du har också ett nära samarbete med resten av teamet på Learnways, som alla, utifrån sina kompetensområden bidrar till lösningar med lärandet i fokus.



I arbetet med innehåll och koncept utgår vi från forskning och erfarenhet av digitalt lärande. Syftet med alla våra projekt är att målgruppen ska lära sig så mycket som möjligt på så kort tid som möjligt. För dig som ska utveckla innehåll och koncept blir en förståelse för pedagogik, användarvänlighet, digitalt lärande och målgruppers behov avgörande.



Varje utbildning bygger på en informationsstruktur, interaktionsdesign och ett textinnehåll som gör att målgruppen enkelt kan ta till sig nya insikter.

 **Dina arbetsuppgifter**


* Du kommer att vara en viktig del i att omsätta kunders problem, behov och information till digitalt lärande
* Du kommer tillsammans med projektledare att driva innehålls- och konceptarbetet i iterativa projektprocesser mot kund
* Du kommer att ansvara för att skriva manus och fylla både befintliga och nya koncept med innehåll
* Du kommer att presentera koncept för kund vid införsäljning, både skriftligt och muntligt

  


**Rollen kräver**


* förmågan att ta in och förstå stora mängder information på kort tid
* förmågan att analysera, strukturera och konkretisera information
* förmågan att skriva snabbt och målgruppsanpassat, både på svenska och engelska
* förmågan att idéutveckla utifrån webbens möjligheter och begränsningar

  


**Vi söker dig som**


* är snäll, prestigelös och vågar testa dig fram
* på ett övertygande sätt kan presentera det du gör för andra
* arbetar bra med andra människor och tycker om att bygga relationer
* arbetar självständigt, är initiativrik och ansvarstagande samt litar på din egen förmåga

  


**Du bör ha**


* erfarenhet av kreativt skrivande, copywriting eller ux-writing
* erfarenhet av arbete med text för webben eller andra digitala kanaler
* utbildning inom skrivande, webb, kommunikation, design, pedagogik, journalistik eller motsvarande

  


**Meriterande erfarenheter**


* Pedagogik i digitala kanaler
* UX/UI-design (i exempelvis Figma)
* Visuell design och webbutveckling

title: Customer Success Manager / Projektledare till ledande...
description:
### **Customer Success Manager / Projektledare till Vendre**


Har du erfarenhet av onboarding av kunder, teknisk projektledning och e-handel? Vill du vara en nyckelspelare i att utveckla kundrelationer och maximera deras framgång? Då kan du vara den vi söker!


Vi är ett techbolag som har byggt och vidareutvecklar en e-handelsplattform för primärt svenska bolag som säljer till Sverige och internationellt. Vi har funnits sedan 2007 och är idag en av Sveriges snabbast växande e-handelsplattformar

### **Om rollen**


Som **Customer Success Manager / Projektledare** på Vendre ansvarar du för att säkerställa en smidig och värdeskapande upplevelse för våra kunder. Du arbetar nära våra e-handelskunder, hjälper dem att implementera och optimera vår plattform samt ser till att de når sina affärsmål. Rollen innebär både teknisk projektledning och strategisk kundbearbetning.

### **Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:**

* **Onboarding & projektledning** – Leda implementationer och säkerställa en framgångsrik uppstart för nya kunder.
* **Strategisk kundhantering** – Arbeta aktivt med befintliga kunder för att optimera deras användning av plattformen och öka kundvärdet.
* **Målstyrt arbete** – Du arbetar mot tydliga kundspecifika KPI:er såsom CCR (Customer Churn Rate), CHS (Customer Health Score) och CLTV (Customer Lifetime Value).
* **Tvärfunktionellt samarbete** – Fungera som länken mellan kund, utveckling, support och sälj.
* **Proaktiv rådgivning** – Identifiera möjligheter för kunder att växa genom nya funktioner, SEO-strategier eller plattformsoptimeringar.

### **Vem är du?**

* Har erfarenhet av **onboarding och teknisk projektledning** av komplexa produkter eller tjänster.
* Har **arbetat med befintliga kunder**, exempelvis inom Customer Success eller Account Management.
* Har **bakgrund inom e-handel**, antingen från **konsultsidan, inhouse eller en annan SaaS-plattform**.
* Har förståelse för **SEO och digital tillväxtstrategi** (meriterande).
* Är en **kommunikativ och lösningsorienterad** person som trivs i en dynamisk och kundnära roll.
* Meriterande: **Kunskap om systemintegrationer och API-hantering**

### **För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du**

* Har ett stort intresse av att vårda kundrelationer.
* Tänker e-handel utifrån ett helhetsperspektiv när du konsulterar kunder- allt från UX till SEO-uppbyggnad.
* Förstår vikten av att följa en process och gillar att kommunicera.
* Har lätt att hitta lösningar och att sätta dig in i befintlig dokumentation och processer.

### **Varför Vendre? ‍️**


Vi är en innovativ SaaS-plattform för e-handel med en stark tillväxtresa. Hos oss får du en central roll i att forma kundupplevelsen och möjligheten att påverka både kundens och vår egen framgång. Vi erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö, möjlighet till personlig utveckling och chansen att arbeta med några av Sveriges mest spännande e-handlare.


**Låter det här som din nästa utmaning?** Skicka in din ansökan redan idag!


Observera att vi ej tar emot ansökningar via mail. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig.

title: Product Manager
description:
*Benify is an international HR tech company that provides a market-leading global benefit and total rewards platform. With over 550* Benifyers in 6 countries, we're driving success with over 1500 customers and approximately two million users around the world *We empower people to be the best they can be while fostering a sustainable and engaging work culture where employees feel engaged and included* *"Because People Matter"*
  

  

**Wo****rking as a Product Manager (Payments)**  

In this role, you will join our high-performing software product management team and play a crucial role in sustaining and amplifying our global success. You will be responsible for excelling our product offering by managing and evolving the payments area. You will ensure that payment solutions interconnect efficiently, optimizing their use to provide the best possible user experience. Additionally, you will drive strategic initiatives, analyze opportunities, and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to shape the future of payments within our platform.
  

  

**You will also:**

* Define and manage the roadmap for payments, ensuring alignment with business objectives and user needs.
* Conduct opportunity analysis and pre-studies to prepare for investment decisions and prioritize initiatives in collaboration with the PM team.
* Responsible for writing and refining requirements according to set processes. Hold workshops and align with stakeholders.
* Work closely with Product Owners, UX, Tech, Professional Services, and Product Marketing to ensure successful launches of new payment functionalities.
Partner with UX to create a consumer-grade experience for employees and employers.  
* 

  

**Who** **are you?**


* You have several, 5+ years of experience in a similar role within the IT/software industry.
* Extensive experience in payment solutions either within a global payments platform company (Adyen or similar) or by integrating such solutions into a business platform.
* Strong understanding of industry trends, challenges, and compliance.
* Excellent knowledge of product management and agile processes.
* You have a great business, commercial & customer mindset and understand metrics, growth, usage, customer value, and profitability.
* Knowledge around new technology (cloud, AI, microservices, APIs etc) is valuable in the role.
* Fluent in English.

**Desirable**:


Experience with alternative payment methods, including invoicing, self-invoicing, salary deductions, and flexible budgets.  

* 

  

**To be successful in this position,** communication is your strength and you excel at translating complex solutions into simple explanations accessible to all. Beyond individual proficiency, you're a genuine team player. Your cooperative nature and personality not only fosters collaboration but also garners respect and people are naturally drawn to your authenticity. If you resonate with drive, clarity, optimism, and collaborative spirit, you're the one we're looking for. We're seeking a driven individual eager to make a meaningful impact.
  

  

**Why** **Join Us?**


* Take full life-cycle ownership of the **payments** domain in a high-impact role.
* Work with **cutting-edge** payment solutions and shape the future of digital transactions.
* Be part of an **experienced, collaborative, and innovative product team.**
Enjoy a flexible, hybrid work environment with an international reach.  
* 

  

**Perks of being a** **Benifyer**


* Generous wellness allowance or health budget ‍️
* 30 days vacation
* Pension
* Guaranteed work-life balance with a hybrid work model
* A variety of social events and activities at our offices ️
* Workation - possibility to work abroad within EU .

*If you want to know more about what* it's like to work at Benify, please check out our careers page *here.*
  

  

**Practical information**
  

**L****ocation:** Stockholm, Gothenburg, London or Munich
  

**E****xtent:** Full-time, 100%
  

**Start Date:** As soon as we find our perfect match.


We encourage you to apply by submitting your CV and/or LinkedIn profile using the application form below. Constant application screening implies our search may end before the last application date, so hurry!


*We are an equal opportunity employer and are happy to accommodate any reasonable adjustments necessary to help you during the interview process.*

title: UX/UI Designer Intern
company_industry: Software Development, Manufacturing, and IT System Training and Support
description:
**XR Solutions** 
 is a technology based company that utilizes machine learning and powerful research-based optimizations to provide practical, reliable and optimizing augmented reality solutions to industrial companies.
 



 We believe that our AR technology can change working methods, the way of thinking and enable new innovative solutions that previously was not achievable in industry and machine operation.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We are seeking a passionate and dedicated
 **UX/UI Designer** 
 to join our team for an Internship. This is an exciting opportunity for someone looking to gain hands-on experience in Design, Marketing and XR within a fast-paced and supportive environment.
 



  





**You will among other things be work with:** 




  




* Be involved in all stages of the design process within projects; from research, workshops, idea generation, concepts to prototypes and delivery of design.
* Create marketing content and be a part of taking our product to market.
* Create interaction design through customer journeys, sketches, wireframes and prototypes based on insights.
* Use creative tools like Figma and other suitable design software in the XR space.
* Conducting deep interviews and workshops for user research and product testing.
* Monitor and design the interface for head-mounted XR glasses and how the user should integrate with the software (e.g. Hand movements, eye tracking, etc.)



  





**To succeed in this role, you should have** 




  




* Previous of relevant work experience in UX/UI and
 **XR Design** 
 (
 **Meritorious)**
* An ability to easily communicate and work with others in teams, both with colleagues and customers.
* A self-propelled working method
* An ability to choose the tools and methods that best suit each specific situation.
* A user-focused mindset – a passionate drive for understanding and meeting user needs.
* Experience with Figma
* Open mindset to try new working methods and software tools that just launched on the market.



  





**What we offer** 



* Practical experience of e.g. product development in the AR-Space 🕵️
* Opportunity to contribute directly to the growth of an exciting Startup 💪
* Remote work and flex Office spaces 👩‍💻
* Strategic work and planning 📊
* Be part of a product launch 🚀



  





 If you’re excited about this opportunity and eager to learn, please send your resume outlining your interest in the position. We look forward to helping you grow your skills and advance your career in Design and marketing.
 



  





 This is a unpaid internship initially

title: UX Designer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
* Collaborate across Business Areas, Group Functions and IT departments and solution suppliers to enhance the user experience.
* Conduct interviews with key stakeholders and operations representatives to gather insights and requirements.
* Assess current solution and explore the possibilities offered by the latest platform version
* Design and define UX solutions that engage business operations and streamline daily workflows.
* Engage with ongoing cyber security initiative to ensure compliance with initiative needs


**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Strong leadership experience to independently drive the project
* Strong teamwork abilities, self-motivated, with a commitment to delivering impactful results
* Proven experience in UX strategy and design
* Basic understanding of IT-security principles
* 3-8 years relevant experience


**Meritorious**
* Knowledge of working according to agile principles
* Experience from software development
* Strong Communication and Stakeholder skills


**Application deadline:** 
 21-02-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Product Director
description:
**Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?** 




  





 Our goal is to make communication smarter, safer, and more efficient, all while building trust everywhere. We're all about bringing you smart services with a big social impact, keeping you safe from fraud, harassment, scam calls, or messages, so you can focus on the conversations that matter.
 



  




* Top 20 most downloaded apps globally, and world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS, with extensive AI capabilities, with more than
 **420 million** 
 active users per month.
* Founded in 2009 with an impressive year-on-year growth
 
 with
 
 high profitability.
* Listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and is categorized as a Large Cap. Our focus on innovation, operational excellence, sustainable growth, and collaboration has resulted in consistently high profitability and strong EBITDA margins.



  





**As the Product Director, Search at Truecaller** 
 , you will lead the strategy, development, and execution of the product roadmap for the team that powers our core search and identification capabilities. You will be responsible for ensuring Truecaller continues to deliver world-class caller ID, fraud detection, and spam prevention by leveraging cutting-edge AI, data science, and scalable backend services. This role is critical to our mission of making communication safer and more efficient for hundreds of millions of users worldwide. This role demands a deep understanding of data-intensive products, AI-driven insights, and proven experience leading product development for Android apps and high-availability backend services. You will collaborate closely with senior data scientists, backend and Android engineers, UX designers, and other product managers to drive innovation and enhance Truecaller’s core functionalities.
 



 Reporting directly to the VP of Product, you will play a key role in aligning your team’s strategy with Truecaller’s overall product vision and business goals.
 



  





 The Search business unit encompasses multiple teams focused on caller identification, spam and fraud prevention, and data insights. You will oversee product development and ensure seamless alignment with Truecaller’s broader vision.
 



  





**The impact you will create:** 




  




* Define and champion the product strategy for Search, driving long-term growth and success.
* Lead the development of AI-driven innovations to enhance Truecaller’s fraud detection, spam blocking, and caller identification capabilities.
* Ensure that search and caller identification services provide a seamless, fast, and accurate experience for hundreds of millions of users globally.
* Drive roadmap execution in close collaboration with data science, engineering, and design teams.
* Manage key Search KPIs, ensuring continuous improvement in accuracy, performance, and user experience.
* Build, mentor, and scale the team, ensuring we have the right mix of product managers, engineers, and data scientists to achieve our ambitious goals.



  





**What you bring in:** 




  




* 10+ years of experience in product management, with at least 5 years in a senior leadership role.
* Proven experience in AI-driven products, search technologies, or fraud/spam prevention.
* Strong background in data-intensive environments and experience working effectively with senior data scientists.
* Demonstrated success in leading cross-functional teams, including data science, backend engineering, Android development, and UX.
* Ability to define and articulate a compelling product vision while aligning with broader company objectives.
* Exceptional leadership skills with the ability to inspire, mentor, and develop high-performing teams.
* Solid understanding of AI, data pipelines, and backend architecture for high-availability services.
* Excellent communication, interpersonal, and stakeholder management skills, with experience collaborating across global teams.



  





**Life at Truecaller -** 
 Behind the code:
 **https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/** 




  





**Sounds like your dream job?** 




  





 We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. As part of the recruitment process, we will conduct a background check.
 



**This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.** 




 We only accept applications
 **in English** 
 .
 



  





**What we offer:** 




  




* **A smart, talented, and agile team:** 
 An international team where ~35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing, and fun environment.
* **A great compensation package** 
 : Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance, parental leave top-up, pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, and free gym membership.
* **Great tech tools:** 
 Pick the computer and phone you most fancy within our budget ranges.
* **Office life:** 
 We strongly believe in in-person collaboration and follow an office-first approach while offering some flexibility. Enjoy your days with great colleagues with loads of good stuff to learn from, and a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages. In addition, now and then, check out the playroom for a fun break or join our exciting parties and/or team activities such as Lab days, Running team, movie nights in our cinema, or a Geek lunch. There's something for everyone!



  





**Come as you are:** 




  





 Truecaller is diverse, equal, and inclusive. We need a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc.
 **All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you**

title: Program Coordinator (paid internship)
description:
🚀
 **The Scaling School is scaling up!** 




  





 We train founders and teams to build businesses in a
 **focused, fast, and fun way** 
 —and now, we’re expanding across Sweden and Finland! We’re seeking a
 **full-time Program Coordinator (Internship)** 
 to help us run our programs smoothly and efficiently. This is a
 **paid internship** 
 where you’ll be at the heart of operations—
 **coordinating workshops, handling customer communication, supporting trainers, and managing digital tools** 
 .
 



  





 Want to join us to help build the
 **world’s most efficient growth program?** 




  





 What you will do

 The Scaling School’s growth programs (both online and onsite)
* **Manage customer communication** 
 —ensuring smooth interactions in both simple and complex projects
* **Support trainers** 
 by preparing materials, assisting during workshops and troubleshooting in real-time
* **Handle digital tools & data** 
 —adapting CRM systems, creating customer surveys, and analyzing program feedback
* Be an
 **organized, proactive** 
 team player, helping to
 **run operations smoothly**



**﻿** 




 Qualifications
 


* **2+ years of experience** 
 in a startup, agency, or similar fast-moving environment

 **project management,** 
 handling multiple tasks at once
* **Meticulous and structured** 
 , with strong organisational and time-management skills

 Zoom, Miro, Google Drive, Zapier, CRM systems, and eager to learn more. UX skills are a plus
* **Fluent in English and Swedish** 
 with excellent skills in writing and communication

title: Brand Professional
description:
At Sandvik Group, we’re now looking for a passionate Brand Professional to join us and enhance our brand identity and positioning, while building a dynamic global network.
   

  

 Ahead of you is an interesting, inspiring and challenging opportunity that requires commitment, curiosity and an agile and holistic outlook – a truly great opportunity for someone who wants to learn and develop, both personally and professionally. Welcome to the World of Sandvik!
   

  

**About Your Job**
 In this position, you play a key role in brand development and with an omnichannel approach, you create and deliver assets to strengthen our brand positioning. This includes planning, producing, driving, distributing and following up on various brand activities. You guide the communication and marketing organizations on brand positioning, design, tone-of-voice, business value, as well as support branding matters and advise stakeholders on brand implications. You also work with collaborative groups to protect and further develop the Sandvik Group brand identity across the globe.
   

  

 You continuously test new ideas across all brand-related initiatives, incorporating the latest available technologies such as AI, analytics, UX and content editing. By applying an agile way of working, you lead and develop actions based on brand measurements and manage our network of brand-related partners, ensuring effective brand management and collaboration.
   

  

 The preferred location is our headquarters at the World Trade Center in Stockholm, while being close to another Sandvik location is possible. Some travel may occur, and we apply a hybrid work set-up where you can combine office and remote work.
   

  

**Your profile**
 We’re looking for someone with extensive experience in brand and general marketing and communications, including data analytics and brand strategy, preferably in multi brand global organizations. You have strong skills in storytelling and channel-, content-, supplier- and project management. You have a relevant education and it’s beneficial to have a proactive, agile and structured way of working, with analytical eyes and attention to detail. Acting in a global setting calls for excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written.
   

  

 With a collaborative approach and constant drive to new things, you see the bigger picture, set ambitious objectives and thoroughly drive activities to achieve goals. By being the definition of a doer, you stay focused and deliver results even with multiple assignments. Your business-oriented and strategic mindset aligns with your operational work. With your excellent communication skills, you cooperate and establish networks internally and externally on an international scale.
   

  

**Our culture**
 Our role is clear – through every action, every day, we make the shift and advance the world through engineering. We believe in an inclusive, equal and open-minded culture, and we nurture our diversities to form a solid foundation for achieving great results. Add fair and rewarding benefits, as well as many different career options. Are you intrigued? Visit our website, LinkedIn or Facebook page to get to know us further.
   

  

**Contact information**
 For further information about this position, please contact Cristina Kapp, Vice President Corporate Communications & Brand, +46 (0)72-143 95 62, cristina.kapp@sandvik.com
   

  

 We’ve already decided on which advertising channels and marketing campaigns we wish to use, and respectfully decline any additional contacts in that matter.
   

  

 Union contacts – Sweden
   

  

* Kristina Sundell, Unionen, +46 (0)70 211 64 00
* Erik Knebel, Akademikerföreningen, +46 (0)70 340 47 03
* Peter Olsson-Andrée, Ledarna, +46 (0)70 222 48 55


 Recruitment Specialist: Lisbeth Häggström and Tanja Benavides
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Send your application no later than February 25, 2025. Click apply and include your resume and cover letter in English. Please note that we don’t accept applications by e-mail. Job ID: R0075364.
   

  

 As we aim for a fair recruitment process, we utilize assessment tools to safeguard objectivity. When you apply for this job, you will therefore receive an invitation via email to a personality and logic ability test. Feedback comes immediately after the test has been completed and the selection process begins after the application deadline.
   

  

 To learn more about our recruitment process, please visit our career site or contact HR Services at hrservices.sweden@sandvik.com.
   

  

*Sandvik is a global, high-tech engineering group providing solutions that enhance productivity, profitability and sustainability for the manufacturing, mining and infrastructure industries. We are at the forefront of digitalization and focus on optimizing our customers’ processes. Our world-leading offering includes equipment, tools, services and digital solutions for machining, mining, rock excavation and rock processing. In 2023 the Group had approximately 41 ,000 employees and revenues of about 127 billion SEK in about 150 countries within continuing operations.*

title: Senior UX Designer
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1200+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder led, profitable and growing.
   

  

 We are hiring a Senior UX Designer to drive the design team and be accountable for whole-team performance, delivery, quality and completeness.
   

  

 Not only will you be delivering outstanding UX experiences, but also generating and implementing ideas for improvement that impact the whole team.
   

  

 Our design team is on a mission to turn complex, open-source software into efficient, intuitive products that can change how complex systems are built and what open source is capable of for enterprise IT. We are looking for an exceptional user experience designer, who shares our passion.
   

  

 This role sits in the design team reporting to one of the UX design managers.
   

  

 Location:
 *This role will be based remotely in the EMEA region.*
**The role entails**
* Working with the open source community and Canonical customers to research new features and improvements
* Collaborating with product managers and engineers to shape the future of Canonical products
* Providing direction to the design team, keeping our efforts aligned with product strategy and best practices
* Working to evolve and evangelise design systems that drive consistency and efficiency
* Tackling systems-level problems with numerous interconnected constraints
* Spearheading end-to-end design processes for challenges of various scales
* Shaping one of our working groups to drive Canonical design forward horizontally


**What we are looking for in you**
* Exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
* Bachelor's or equivalent in User Experience, Design, or STEM or a compelling narrative about your alternative chosen path
* Knowledge and passion for user experience, technology and design
* Commitment to continuous learning and improvement - curious, flexible, scientific
* Result-oriented with a drive to finish work and celebrate success
* Confidence in user research practices
* Engagement with the latest design research and innovation
* Ability to travel internationally twice a year, for company events up to two weeks long


 UX designers should be excellent communicators who are at ease working with a complex mix of engineers, designers and executives. They represent us at cross-functional company meetings and must present their design position with clarity and precision. They should be confident and excited to take on complex design challenges. They should also be able to connect their design leadership to the strategic vision of the company.
   

  

 Read more about the design team
   

  

**What we offer you**
 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
*We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products.* 
*Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration* 
*.*

title: Graduate Kickstart Program - Product manager
description:
Our solutions are a key part of most industries - electronics, medical research, renewable energy, food production, infrastructure and many more. Working with us means working with the latest technologies and groundbreaking, sustainable innovations.
 **Join us on our journey for a better tomorrow.**
**Join Our Graduate Kickstart Program: Shaping the Future of Product Management**
 Are you a newly graduated university student with a passion for product development and innovation? Our Graduate Kickstart Program is designed to attract and develop the future's top product managers. Participants will play a crucial role in defining and delivering innovative products that meet customer needs and drive the company's growth. The program offers an in-depth exploration of product development, business strategy, and customer-centered innovation.
   

  

**Purpose of the Program**
 Our Graduate Kickstart Program aims to attract and develop future product managers. Participants will play a central role in defining and delivering innovative products that meet customer needs and drive the company's growth. The program offers a deep dive into product development, business strategy, and customer-centered innovation.
   

  

**Role And Responsibilities**
 As a participant in the program, you will:
   

  

* Participate in the entire product development process—from idea and concept to launch and follow-up.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design, engineering, marketing, and sales, to ensure successful product launches.
* Identify customer needs and market trends through analysis, customer interviews, and insights from user data.
* Contribute to the development of product strategies and roadmaps to meet both customer needs and business goals.
* Define product requirements and write clear specifications.
* Analyze product performance and suggest improvements based on data and customer feedback.
* Contribute to sustainable and innovative solutions that strengthen the company's competitiveness.


**Qualifications**
* Academic credentials: Master's or Bachelor's degree in relevant fields such as:
+ Industrial Engineering
+ Business Development and Innovation
+ Engineering (e.g., Mechanical, Electrical, or Computer Science)
+ Marketing or Product Design

* Experience from internships, thesis work, or projects related to product development, innovation, or business strategy is advantageous.


**Technical Skills**
* Basic understanding of product development and technical processes.
* Experience in project management or working in cross-functional teams.
* Familiarity with tools such as:
+ Jira, Trello, or other product and project management tools
+ Data analysis tools like Excel, Power BI, or Google Analytics
+ Prototyping tools like Figma or Adobe XD (advantageous)


**Language Skills**
* Fluent in English and Swedish, both spoken and written.
* Other languages are an advantage


**Personal Attributes**
* Customer focus: A strong interest in understanding and meeting customer needs.
* Analytical: Ability to interpret data and draw conclusions to improve products and processes.
* Communicative: Clear and persuasive in both written and verbal communication.
* Initiative: Ability to take responsibility for projects and drive them forward.
* Creative and innovative: A knack for thinking outside the box and creating new solutions.
* Collaborative: Ability to work in teams and build strong relationships with various stakeholders.


**Desired Values and Interests**
* Passion for innovation and creating products that solve real customer problems.
* Interest in technology, market trends, and business development.
* Commitment to driving sustainability and social responsibility in product development.


**What The Company Offers**
* A structured 18-month graduate program, including:
+ Rotation between different roles within ITBA
+ Opportunities to work on strategic projects and gain insight into the entire product lifecycle
+ Training in areas such as:
- Product strategy and roadmap planning
- Customer-centered design and user experience (UX)
- Agile development and methodologies (e.g., Scrum)

+ Mentorship from experienced product managers and access to a network of industry leaders
+ International opportunities to understand global product markets
+ Full time employement from day 1.


 Take the first step towards an exciting career in product management. Apply now and join us in shaping the future!
   

  

**Diverse by nature and inclusive by choice**
 Bright ideas come from all of us. The more unique perspectives we embrace, the more innovative we are. Together we build a culture where difference is valued and we share a deep sense of purpose and belonging.

title: Chief Product Officer
description:
Hive Streaming partners with 150 of the world’s largest enterprises to deliver exceptional Video Experiences, enabling alignment, innovation, and measurable impact through live video.
   

  

 We’re looking for a dynamic Chief Product Officer (CPO) to drive our product strategy and execution, ensure a strong feedback loop with key customers, and advocate strongly for Hive’s solutions.
   

  

**The Role**
 As CPO, you will lead Hive’s product team of eight professionals—including UX designers, product owners, and product marketers based in Stockholm—and serve as the face of our products to our customers and the market. You’ll meet customers directly, championing Hive’s solutions with passion and confidence. Reporting to the CEO, you will collaborate closely with the CTO and the engineering team, as well as ensure alignment between product, engineering, and commercial success.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Lead and Guide the Product Team: Manage and actively contribute to the company’s Product Roadmap. Use the Product Roadmap to help the team translate Hive’s mission and strategy into tangible and impactful product solutions delivered according to plan.
* Be a Product Ambassador: Actively engage with customers as the face of Hive’s product, showcasing how our solutions solve real-world problems and deliver measurable outcomes.
* Drive Product Execution: Accelerate delivery of innovative, high-quality solutions across our multi-product strategy, enhancing Video Experience and creating tangible value for customers.
* Champion Data-Driven Insights: Promote a culture of measuring what matters, ensuring data and analytics drive product decisions and continuous improvement.
* Collaborate Across Teams: Work hand-in-hand with marketing, sales, and engineering to align on strategy, storytelling, and market impact.
* Create Compelling Narratives: Develop and communicate product value propositions that resonate deeply with enterprise customers and inspire adoption.


**What We’re Looking For**
* Product Advocate: Confident in engaging directly with customers, understanding their needs, and demonstrating the value of our solutions.
* Proven Leader: Demonstrated success in leading development projects and product teams, ideally in enterprise SaaS or other software platform-related areas.
* Customer-Centric Innovator: Strong ability to translate customer pain points into actionable product strategies.
* Collaborative Communicator: Comfortable aligning product, engineering, marketing, and sales teams around the product roadmap.
* Data-Driven Decision Maker: Experienced in using analytics to drive strategy and measure impact.
* Execution-Oriented: Focused on delivering high-quality, results-driven solutions on time.


****Why join Hive?****
* Global Impact: Partner with 150 of the world’s largest enterprises, helping them achieve alignment and measurable success through live video.
* Dynamic Culture: Join a collaborative, fast-paced environment that values execution, innovation, and customer focus.
* Empowered Leadership: Play a pivotal role in shaping Hive’s future while connecting directly with the customers who rely on our solutions.
* Pioneering Innovation: Be at the forefront of building strategic communication tools that empower enterprises to thrive amidst massive change.


 We are looking forward to your application!

title: Product Owner – Digital Experience
description:
We are looking for a Product Owner for the Digital Experience team. In this role, you will lead initiatives to optimize the Digital Onboarding and Portal Experience, reducing onboarding time, enhancing customer satisfaction, and improving cost efficiencies. You will also drive the development of a consolidated SMB portal platform, ensuring seamless self-service use cases that lower manual labor costs and deliver effortless customer experiences.
   

  

**Your tasks**
* Define and communicate the vision for Digital Onboarding and Portal Experience, aligning with strategic goals
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams (UX/UI, engineering, marketing) to deliver user-centric solutions
* Conduct research and analyze customer feedback to continuously enhance onboarding and self-service functionalities
* Lead initiatives to streamline onboarding processes and improve portal usability
* Monitor and analyze KPIs to measure success and identify improvements


**Requirements**
* Proven experience as a Product Owner or similar role in digital product management
* Expertise in driving customer onboarding and self-service initiatives
* Strong analytical and project management skills
* Experience working with cross-functional teams


 Job no. 250113-ITO19

title: Senior Product Manger
company_industry: Health, Wellness & Fitness and Consumer Services
description:
**Lifesum is a consumer health-tech company** 
 trusted by over 60 million users worldwide and empowers individuals to build healthier, more sustainable habits that improve their lives every day. Their AI-driven solutions provide personalized insights and smarter tools, making healthy choices easier, more intuitive, and deeply engaging. Through their platform, they spark motivation and inspire positive change, making healthy eating not just easier but truly enjoyable.
 



  





 Lifesum has a hybrid global team headquartered in Stockholm and you’ll have the opportunity to impact millions of lives by helping our users on their personal journeys to look and feel better every day!
 



  





 If you are passionate about building user-centric digital products, driving AI-powered innovation, and making a real difference in people’s lives, we’d love to hear from you.
 



  





**The role** 




 As Senior Product Manager, your primary responsibility is to lead product delivery by transforming user needs and market opportunities into actionable strategies and impactful outcomes that shape the future of our health-tech solutions. You’ll play a hands-on role in driving our goals within a cross-functional setup, leveraging your strong leadership skills to navigate challenges and deliver results. Collaborating closely with developers, designers, UX specialists, business stakeholders, and product analysts, you’ll ensure alignment, foster innovation, and create meaningful value for our users.
 



  




* Develop and articulate a clear product vision and roadmap aligned with the company’s objectives and user needs in the health-tech market.
* Collaborate with executive leadership to define long-term goals and strategies for innovation in user-centric health technology solutions.
* Manage the product lifecycle from concept to launch, ensuring delivery of intuitive and impactful solutions that meet user needs.
* Lead cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, compliance, marketing, and data analytics, to execute on product priorities.
* Conduct comprehensive market research to identify trends, user behaviors, and opportunities.
* Use insights from competitive analysis and user feedback to inform product strategies and feature prioritization.
* Work closely with external partners and technology providers, to enhance product offerings.
* Define, monitor, and analyze key performance metrics to evaluate product success and guide continuous improvements.
* Leverage user analytics and testing to refine the product roadmap and optimize features.
* Agile product management practices, such as sprint planning, backlog prioritization, and iterative releases.
* Mentor and coach team members, fostering a culture of collaboration and accountability.
* Advocate for user-centric design principles, ensuring that products are accessible, intuitive, and solve real-world problems.



  





**What we are looking for:** 



* 5-7+ years of product management experience, ideally within health-tech, subscription businesses or a similar user-focused technology industry.
* Demonstrated success in delivering digital products or platforms.
* Strong technical acumen or familiarity with platforms, APIs, and web/mobile technologies.
* Proficiency in analytics tools (e.g., Amplitude, Google Analytics) and user feedback tools.
* Experience in running A/B testing and interpreting data to guide product decisions.
* Experience in conducting user research to deeply understand user needs, behaviors, and pain points.
* Strong leadership skills with a proven track record of inspiring and aligning cross-functional teams around user-focused goals.
* Exceptional communication skills to convey product vision and strategies to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Understanding of the nuances in delivering health-tech solutions to international and multicultural user bases.
* Bachelor’s degree in business, Engineering, Healthcare Management, or a related field; an MBA or advanced degree in technology management is a plus.
* Excellent problem-solving abilities with comfort managing ambiguity in a dynamic environment.
* Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
* Passion for health-tech and a commitment to improving user experiences through innovation.
* It’s a great plus if you have experience working with generative AI, understanding of how AI can optimize workflows and influence priorities.

title: Junior Application Configuration Specialist (fixed term)
description:
**Responsibilities**
 As an Application Configuration Specialist at Benify, you will be responsible for ensuring the portal aligns with both internal and external requirements, managing the process from portal creation to launch. Your role involves designing, building, and updating benefit solutions according to business rules within the Benify platform for our international clients.
   

  

 You will collaborate with internal and external stakeholders, as well as globally dispersed cross-functional teams. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to contribute to and support the product roadmap to facilitate further improvements. While you will be part of the Application Configuration function, your daily work will take place in an Agile squad alongside various other functions to ensure successful implementation, delivering a coherent, compliant, and fully tested solution.
   

  

**As An Application Configuration Specialist, You Will**
* Work in a T-Shaped manner within an Agile cross-functional globally dispersed squad, owning the full delivery lifecycle.
* Become an expert in the functionalities of Benify's platform – from creating a new portal to Go-live.
* Design, build, update and quality assure the configuration of all types of Benefits in line with best practices, business rules and financial details.
* Collaborate with clients to meet eligibility requirements within the portal, including attending client meetings to consult on our products.
* Troubleshoot and investigate configuration issues.
* Contribute and support the product roadmap.


**Personal Attributes**
 We are looking for a strong
 **problem solver** 
 to troubleshoot and resolve diverse issues and client requirements. You'll
 **collaborate** 
 with both internal and external stakeholders, so confidence in
 **communication** 
 is key.
 **Attention to detail** 
 is crucial, as is the ability to take initiative and contribute to developing new ways of working within the team.
   

  

**We Are Looking For Candidates Who Have**
* Bachelor's degree in systems science, Web design, Media technology, Business Administration or equivalent
* Around 6 months experience in web design, UX/UI or application specialization
* Some experience from writing HTML code
* Proficient in English, both oral and written


**The company** 
**🌍**
 Benify is an international HR tech company that provides a market-leading global benefit and total rewards platform. With over 550 Benifyers in 6 countries, we're driving success with over 1500 customers and approximately three million users around the world . We empower people to be the best they can be while fostering a sustainable and engaging work culture where employees feel engaged and included "Because People Matter".
   

  

**Perks of being a Benifyer**
* Collective agreement
* Generous wellness allowance
* 30 days vacation
* ITP1 Pension and Lifeplan - a pension tool that provides you with personalized advice to optimize your retirement planning
* Guaranteed work-life balance with a hybrid work model
* A variety of social events and activities in the offices
* You're responsible for your own development and we offer internal career opportunities


**Practical information**
 Start: As soon as we find the right fit! 🧐
   

  

 Extent: Full-time, 100%- fixed term until March 2026
   

  

 Location: Stockholm or Gothenburg, Sweden.
   

  

*Apply by submitting your CV and/or your LinkedIn profile using the application form below. We screen applications continuously and may hire someone before the last application date.*
*Please let us know if you need any reasonable adjustments for interviews by replying to the email you will receive after you apply.*
 Benify started in 2004 in Sweden with a goal to revolutionize the HR industry with a platform that would improve the lives of employees. Today, Benify is an independent, flexible, and agile global HR technology company, offering the market’s leading global benefits and total rewards platform.

title: Staff Engineer
description:
***This job is with EQT Group, an inclusive employer and a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community. Please do not contact the recruiter directly.***
*EQT recognizes that Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DE&I) have a positive impact on both EQT’s investors, employees and society. We strive to attract top talent representing diversity of backgrounds, experiences, perspectives, and opinions as this is vital to building better businesses, engaging talent, and driving high performance and financial returns.*
**About The Role**
 As a Staff Fullstack Engineer, you will lead technical initiatives, mentor team members, and play a key role in shaping the future of Motherbrain. Working with a modern cloud-based tech stack (GCP), you will drive the design and delivery of scalable systems that enable smarter, data-driven investment decisions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and implement complex, scalable systems for a cloud-based platform.
* Lead and mentor engineering teams, fostering collaboration and technical excellence.
* Collaborate across disciplines with UX/UI designers, ML engineers, and business stakeholders.
* Advocate and implement best practices in testing, CI/CD, and code reviews.
* Engage in strategic planning to align technology initiatives with business goals.


**About You**
 You are a proactive leader with a passion for building innovative systems and empowering teams. Your technical expertise and ability to solve complex challenges make you a driving force in engineering excellence.
   

  

**Essential Skills & Experience**
* Proven track record of leading engineering teams or initiatives.
* Strong knowledge of frontend and backend technologies, including TypeScript, Node.js, React, SQL, and PostgreSQL.
* Expertise in system design and architecture for cloud-based applications (preferably GCP).
* Exceptional communication skills with the ability to influence stakeholders at all levels.
* Growth-oriented mindset with a focus on collaboration and team empowerment.


**Nice-to-Have Qualifications**
* Experience with microservices architecture design and implementation.
* Familiarity with containerization and orchestration tools such as Docker and Kubernetes.
* Knowledge of modern AI tools and APIs (e.g., OpenAI).


**What We Offer**
 At EQT, we value our people and offer a supportive environment for growth and development. As part of the Motherbrain team, you will enjoy:
   

  

* A competitive compensation package, including a generous pension plan and six weeks of vacation.
* Health and wellness benefits, including a domestic allowance program to support work-life balance.
* A vibrant workplace culture with access to a full-time barista and regular team-building activities.
* Opportunities to grow within EQT’s internal career framework.


**Diversity & Inclusion**
 EQT and Motherbrain is committed to a diverse and inclusive workforce. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of ethnicity, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, functional variation, age, or other legally protected status. For individuals with functional variations who would like to request a tour of our accommodation, please reach out.
   

  

**About Motherbrain**
 Motherbrain, an integral team within EQT, integrates data science, machine learning, and AI into our investment strategy, offering a unique platform and opportunity to tackle complex, real-world challenges. Our team, sourced from leading tech companies, leverages the latest technology and collaborates closely with EQT's internal business professionals. This collaboration ensures that our innovative solutions significantly impact diverse sectors such as healthcare, technology, and infrastructure. Here, you'll discover an environment that fosters learning and growth, where your contributions influence tangible business outcomes and play a key role in EQT's global strategy.
   

  

**About EQT**
 EQT is a purpose-driven global investment organization focused on active ownership strategies. With a Nordic heritage and a global mindset, EQT has a track record of almost three decades of developing companies across multiple geographies, sectors and strategies. EQT has investment strategies covering all phases of a business’ development, from start-up to maturity. EQT has EUR ‌ 246 billion in total assets under management (EUR ‌ ‌133 billion in fee-generating assets under management), within two business segments – Private Capital and Real Assets.
   

  

 With its roots in the Wallenberg family’s entrepreneurial mindset and philosophy of long-term ownership, EQT is guided by a set of strong values and a distinct corporate culture. EQT manages and advises funds and vehicles that invest across the world with the mission to future-proof companies, generate attractive returns and make a positive impact with everything EQT does.EQT has offices in more than 25 countries across Europe, Asia and the Americas and has more than 1,800 employees.
   

  

 More info: www.eqtgroup.com
   

  

 Follow EQT on LinkedIn, X, YouTube and Instagram

title: Analytics Engineer till SVT i Stockholm
description:
**Vill du arbeta med stora datamängder och bidra till en mer datadriven Nyhetsverksamhet. Nu söker SVT en nyfiken Analytics Engineer**
 Som Analytics Engineer blir du en viktig del av vårt nya team, där vi samlar analyskompetens för att göra största möjliga skillnad. Du får frihet att gräva i data, skapa smarta lösningar för nyhets- och sportredaktionerna samt produktteamen – allt utifrån ett Data Mesh-tänk!
   

  

 Om du brinner för data och vill göra skillnad i en snabb och dynamisk miljö – då är det här jobbet för dig! Hos oss på SVT får du kombinera teknik, innovation och samhällsnytta – samtidigt som du bidrar till vårt viktiga public service-uppdrag.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig**
* En central roll i ett nytt team med stort handlingsutrymme att forma analysarbetet, med fokus på att höja videoupplevelsen med hjälp av datainsikter
* Att bli en del av ett tvärfunktionellt dataproduktteam som fokuserar på att utveckla smarta lösningar för nyheter och sport
* Att arbeta med ett av Sveriges mest välkända varumärken och skapa produkter som påverkar och engagerar en bred publik
* Ett självstyrande team med mandat att fatta beslut kring tekniska val och arbetssätt, där våra idéer och insikter driver vår produktutveckling
* En härlig och inkluderande arbetsmiljö med regelbundna hackdagar och innovationssprintar
* Att jobba med stora datamängder och modern och intressant tech-stack
* Ett meningsfullt uppdrag – du bidrar till att göra Sverige mer informerat genom datadriven journalistik


**Det här gör du hos oss**
 Här Kommer Du In i En Vardag Där Inte Allt Är Satt Utan Du Kommer Att Tillsammans Med Teamet Prioritera Och Sätta Plan Framåt. Exempel På Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

* Utforska och analysera data som hjälper redaktionerna och produktteamen för att hjälpa dem att fatta datadrivna beslut.
* Bygga datamodeller, dataprodukter och pipelines för att säkerställa att våra team har tillgång till relevant och välorganiserad data och insikter.
* Arbeta med realtidsanalys, A/B-testning och explorativ analys för att identifiera förbättringsmöjligheter.


**Ditt team och arbetsplats**
 Du blir en del av ett nytt utforskande dataproduktteam som arbetar tätt ihop för att stärka SVT:s datadrivna arbetssätt. Teamet består av Analytics Engineers samt en PO och en UX-specialist som båda har analysbakgrund. Vi arbetar nära redaktion, andra datateam och produktutvecklingsteam för att skapa lösningar som underlättar i deras vardag och skapar värde för SVT.
   

  

**Mer om dig**
 Vi söker dig som vill förstå och skapa värde för våra användare! Du har en stark teknisk grund med goda kunskaper inom bl.a SQL, dbt, Python och BigQuery och molnbaserade dataplattformar (GCP eller liknande). Vi ser även gärna att du har erfarenhet av datamodellering och –orkestrering (Airflow eller liknande) samt gillar att jobba explorativt. Du är trygg med att ta dig an utmaningar i teknisk miljö och duktig på att förbättra och förädla den.
   

  

 Du är handlingskraftig, analytisk och nyfiken på att utforska data för att dra insikter som skapar affärsvärde. Viktigast är dock din förmåga att självständigt driva analyser, identifiera behov och skapa lösningar som gör skillnad.
   

  

 Vi ser även att du är trygg med både engelska och svenska. Vi använder engelska i ett av våra team samt i alla gemensamma möten inom produktområdet.
   

  

 Vi samarbetar med ADA Digital med den här rekryteringen. Alla ansökningar tas emot av dem. Sök jobbet här.

title: IT Technician Admin
description:

Our business unit High Voltage Products is a leading player in the development, manufacturing and sales of high voltage products for the transmission and distribution of electrical energy. We are now seeking an IT Technician Admin to join our team in Ludvika, Sweden.


In this role, you will have the opportunity to work hands-on with PowerBI, Power Apps and other tools. You will also take part of creating digital supporting tools for our different processes. If you are interested in IT and want to contribute to making the world more sustainable, flexible, and secure, we encourage you to apply!
