title: Emerging Enterprise Account Executive, Nordics
description:
SLSQ426R300



Want to join a fast growth pre-IPO organisation that could define the next stage of your career?



Reporting to the Regional Sales Manager, as an Emerging Enterprise Account Executive at Databricks, you come with relevant experience selling to Start-up and Mid-maket accounts in the Nordics. As a successful candidate you are a self-starter who understands the consumption sales process. You know how to sell innovation and value to existing customers, identify new use cases and grow consumption and can guide deals forward to compress decision cycles. You love understanding a product in-depth and are passionate about communicating its value to customers and partners. You will be offered huge potential for career progression with the pace of the team's growth.

  

**The impact you will have:**


* Assess your territory and develop a successful execution strategy
* Drive quarter-on-quarter consumption growth in existing accounts
* Exceed activity and quarterly revenue targets
* Track all customer details including use case, purchase time frames, next steps, and forecasting in Salesforce
* Identify new use case opportunities and showcase value to existing customers
* Promote the value of the Databricks' Data Intelligence Platform
* Ensure 100% satisfaction among all customers


**What we look for:**


* Understanding of the data platform and cloud ecosystems
* Some exposure to the software industry and some basic concepts of selling SaaS, Data and Business Value
* Experience growing consumption and closing commit deals in a direct sales role
* Basic understanding on how to research company information and identifying key stakeholders
* General understanding of MEDDPICC
* Experience exceeding sales targets/quotas
* Bachelor's Degree or relevant work experience
* Fluency in English is required, fluency in Swedish is preferred

**About Databricks**



Databricks is the data and AI company. More than 10,000 organizations worldwide — including Comcast, Condé Nast, Grammarly, and over 50% of the Fortune 500 — rely on the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform to unify and democratize data, analytics and AI. Databricks is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices around the globe and was founded by the original creators of Lakehouse, Apache Spark™, Delta Lake and MLflow. To learn more, follow Databricks on Twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook.  

  

**Benefits**  

  

At Databricks, we strive to provide comprehensive benefits and perks that meet the needs of all of our employees. For specific details on the benefits offered in your region, please visit https://www.mybenefitsnow.com/databricks.

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**



At Databricks, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive culture where everyone can excel. We take great care to ensure that our hiring practices are inclusive and meet equal employment opportunity standards. Individuals looking for employment at Databricks are considered without regard to age, color, disability, ethnicity, family or marital status, gender identity or expression, language, national origin, physical and mental ability, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, socio-economic status, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.


**Compliance**



If access to export-controlled technology or source code is required for performance of job duties, it is within Employer's discretion whether to apply for a U.S. government license for such positions, and Employer may decline to proceed with an applicant on this basis alone.
company_description: Databricks, the data and AI company, helps data teams solve the world’s toughest problems.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
**Are you looking for an R&D environment where you can work with world-class scientists and engineers on cutting edge projects? Do you want to contribute to a better world while building a career? Do you also have a passion for science, engineering, technology, business, data and human creativity?**  

  

**We are now looking for Senior Data Scientists to join our Data & AI Engineering unit in Gothenburg or Stockholm. You will be part of a diverse and inclusive team of Data Scientists and Engineers working on solving interesting, real-world problems that truly make a difference. Your main responsibilities will be to deliver value for our clients in the Nordics. Supported by our global knowledge base and network of skilled colleagues, you will be part of strategic discussions, contribute to solutioning and be a driving force for the competence development of your junior colleagues. Main industries for assignments will be Automotive, Manufacturing, Life Science, Retail, and Defence.**  

  

**Requirements for the role:**  

* **PhD in a scientific field (primarily computer science, physics, mathematics, biology, engineering)**
* **A minimum of 5 years of relevant academic and/or professional experience within data science, data engineering, or software engineering**
* **Experience in one or several languages for statistical data analysis: Python, R , C++, etc**
* **Experience in one or several ML libraries: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, etc**
* **Knowledge of cloud platforms, tools and services provided by AWS, Azure or Google Cloud especially AI-related services**
* **Understanding how to implement effective ETL steps on said platforms**
* **Proactive Personality with ability to self-drive tasks and collaborations**
* **An analytical mindset, a willingness to roll up your sleeves and solve hands-on technical challenges**
* **Excellent communication and presentation skills and an ability to explain complex concepts to varied audiences**
* **Ability to interact with external stakeholders such as our Technology providers and Hyperscaler representatives for collaboration**
* **Excellent English communication skills, both spoken and written**
* **Be an EU citizen or hold a Swedish work permit**
**Meritorious skills:**  

* **10+ years of professional experience in Automotive, Manufacturing, Energy, Lifescience or Telecom domains**
* **Business analysis and technical project management skills are an advantage**
* **Interest to be a technical architect for Capgemini offers in data science and AI**
* **Working knowledge of databases, SQL and/or Elasticsearch, and experience with data management tools such as Databricks.**
* **Experience implementing data pipelines using tools such as Spark SQL, PySpark, Kafka and Hadoop.**
* **Interest to carry people management tasks within the consultancy**

  

**We will consider candidates with less years of experience if the majority of the other requirements are fulfilled. If you're passionate about this role and meet most qualifications, we encourage you to apply. We value potential and welcome diverse perspectives, regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, age, disability, sexual orientation, or background.**  

  

**What we offer**  

**Capgemini Engineering is one of the world's leading consulting companies in R&D. We deliver, together with our global centres of expertise, solutions for both large global customers and smaller local start-up companies.**  

**We offer you a work environment branded by innovation. You will be working with the cutting edge of IT and technology, surrounded by dedicated and skilled colleagues with high expertise.**  

  

**As a consultant at Capgemini Engineering and a member of the Data & AI team, you will belong to a global professional community of Data & AI experts with well-formed career paths, trainings and opportunities for mentorship and continuous competence development opportunities.**  

  

**Join us and Get The Future You Want! Welcome with your application!**  

  

**#LI-MS8**

title: Summer Internship - Cyber Security
description:
**About Neo4j:**

Neo4j is the leader in Graph Database & Analytics, helping organizations uncover hidden patterns and relationships across billions of data connections deeply, easily, and quickly. Customers use Neo4j to gain a deeper understanding of their business and reveal new ways of solving their most pressing problems. Over 84% of Fortune 100 companies use Neo4j, along with a vibrant community of 250,000+ developers, data scientists, and architects across the globe.



At Neo4j, we’re proud to build the technology that powers breakthrough solutions for our customers. These solutions have helped NASA get to Mars two years earlier, broke the Panama Papers for the ICIJ, and are helping Transport for London to cut congestion by 10% and save $750M a year. Some of our other notable customers include Intuit, Lockheed Martin, Novartis, UBS, and Walmart.



Neo4j experienced rapid growth this year as organizations looking to deploy generative AI (GenAI) recognized graph databases as essential for improving it’s accuracy, transparency, and explainability. Growth was further fueled by enterprise demand for Neo4j’s cloud offering and partnerships with leading cloud hyperscalers and ecosystem leaders. Learn more at neo4j.com and follow us on LinkedIn.

  


**Our Vision:**

At Neo4j, we have always strived to help the world make sense of data.



As business, society and knowledge become increasingly connected, our technology promotes innovation by helping organizations to find and understand data relationships. We created, drive and lead the graph database category, and we’re disrupting how organizations leverage their data to innovate and stay competitive.


**The Role:**


**The Security team at Neo4j would like to welcome an intern this summer. We have two projects to propose that the intern can choose from. When applying for this position, please write which project you would prefer to work on.**  

  

**1. Security in Aura Portal project:**

  


Aura portal is an internal centre of information about Aura components. Engineering teams use it to monitor the health of the components. The definition of “health” (alternatively known as excellence or software hygiene) needs to be expanded to include security characteristics.


**Project Summary**
===================



It is a known fact in application security that the security team needs to meet the developers at their watering holes. We can achieve better results by presenting security indicators and means to improve them at the portal the developers use for their daily work compared to expecting developers to interact with additional security tools.



The goal of the project is to expand the information presented at the portal to include security indicators and to allow developers clearly defined ways to improve the score of their components.


**Main objective(s) of Internship:**
------------------------------------



To work with the Aura Enablement team to understand the technology behind Aura portal and with AppSec team to add security indicators to Aura components in the portal.


**Key tasks**
-------------



The key tasks are:


* Understand prior art:
+ Monocle: How Chime creates a proactive security & engineering culture (Part 1)
+ A Pragmatic Approach for Internal Security Partnerships
+ GitHub's Engineering Fundamentals program: How we deliver on availability, security, and accessibility

* Understand how https://backstage.spotify.com/marketplace/spotify/plugin/soundcheck/ works
* Review and assess security indicators that can be gathered on Aura components, using 3rd party integrations. Examples:
+ Is the component monitored by Snyk?
+ Are there any open issues in Snyk?
+ Are there any open issues in Dependabot?
+ Are there any open issues in Semgrep?
+ Sysdig?

* Present the indicators in Aura portal in user-friendly manner, providing clear ways on how the scores can be improved
* Gather feedback from developers
* If time allows, monitor engagement and achieved security score improvements

**Required deliverables**
-------------------------



The required deliverables for this project are:


* Enriched Aura portal
* Documentation on added security indicators
* Proposed ways to monitor engagement and indicator trends/history

**Pre-requisites**
------------------



Desired skills/knowledge, etc


* Programming background
* Knowledge of graph database technology would be beneficial
* It is desirable to have an interest in application security and/or software engineering enablement
  


**2. ASVS chatbot: a GraphRAG project:**



In 2024 the Neo4j security team built a prototype ASVS chatbot: https://neo4j.com/developer-blog/asvs-security-graph-chatbot/



It has a graph of ASVS requirements in Aura DB and uses GraphRAG to identify security requirements relevant to a feature. The prototype was released under open source licence, and presented in developer blog and several conferences/meetups, generating good publicity for Neo4j usage in security workflows. We’d like to develop this prototype to become a production worthy application used in Neo4j engineering.


**Project Summary**
===================



The project will provide Neo4j engineering teams with an easy, self-serving way to get security requirements relevant to the feature they are developing. Reducing effort and time for the developer and increasing the likelihood that the development process applies the principle of secure by design.



By productionising and improving the existing prototype this can be achieved. At the moment it needs to be run locally, by setting environment variables and bringing your own key, which impedes engineers' engagement with the chat bot.


**Main objective(s) of Internship:**
------------------------------------



To work with the AppSec team to improve ASVS chat bot, taking the prototype to a full-featured application deployed on Neo4j infrastructure.



Benefits:



* Neo4j engineering has a useful security tool that supports the concept of secure by design


* Neo4j can promote this security use case externally as a case where it deploys its own product in support of the development process, and as an example for sales.


**Key tasks**
-------------



The key tasks are:


* Bring the code to be in line with GenAI Stack: https://neo4j.com/labs/genai-ecosystem/genai-stack/
* Add authentication (ideally SSO, but Google authentication would be acceptable)
* Deploy on Neo4j infrastructure so that Neo4j internal users can run it in the browser without the need for a local installation.
* Run a model locally, to eliminate the need to send feature descriptions to an external LLM provider
* Add features:
+ Additional security resources added to the knowledge graph
+ Fine tune retrieval - utilise full text indexes and other GraphRAG strategies
+ Benchmark and fine tune embedding model
+ Other ideas in these research papers (intern is encouraged to do their own research into GraphRAG state of art):
- https://medium.com/@irina.karkkanen/rag-on-graph-db-using-fixed-entity-architecture-make-you-retrieval-work-for-you-f4bfcac5277f
- https://medium.com/@irina.karkkanen/three-layer-fixed-entity-architecture-for-efficient-rag-on-graphs-787c70e3151a

* If time allows, monitor user engagement and collect additional requirements

**Required deliverables**
-------------------------



The required deliverables for this project are:


* Deployed web application
* Authentication for Neo4j users
* Research and implementation of GraphRAG for improved relevance of requirements

**Pre-requisites**
------------------



Desired skills/knowledge, etc


* Programming background (Python)
* Knowledge of graph database technology would be beneficial
* It is desirable to have an interest in application security and/or software engineering enablement
* Knowledge of GenAI, LLM (no need to be a data scientist/model builder, but to understand programmatical usage patterns - APIs, agents, toolchains)


**Why Join Neo4j?**

Neo4j is, without question, the most popular graph database in the world. We have customers in every industry globally, and our products are a proven product/market fit. Joining our team is an opportunity to shape the future of data and analytics. Below are just a few exciting facts about Neo4j.


* Neo4j is one of the fastest-scaling technology companies in this industry. It recently surpassed $200M in annual recurring revenue (ARR), doubling its ARR over the past three years.
* Raised the biggest funding round in database history ($325M Series F). Backed by world-class investors like Eurazeo, GV (formerly Google Ventures), and Inovia Capital, Neo4j has raised over $600M in funding and is currently valued at over $2Bn. This puts Neo4j among the most well-funded database companies in history.
* 84% of the Fortune 100 and 58% of the Fortune 500 use Neo4j. Examples include Boston Scientific, BT Group, Caterpillar, Cisco, Comcast, Department for Education UK, eBay, NBC News, Novo Nordisk, Worldline, and others.
* Co-founder and CEO Emil Eifrem has built an amazing culture that prides itself on relationships, inclusiveness, innovation, and customer success.
* Countless industry awards. Massive enterprises and individual developers/data scientists love Neo4j. A strong sense of community and ecosystem is built around the platform.
* A recent Forrester Total Economic Impact™ Study cited Neo4j as delivering 417% ROI to customers.
* Neo4j was named as a Visionary in the 2023 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud Database Management Systems among 19 other recognized global DBMS vendors. Neo4j was also ranked as a Strong Performer among 14 top vendors in The Forrester Wave™: Vector Databases, Q3 2024.


Research shows that members of underrepresented communities are less likely to apply for jobs when they don’t meet all the qualifications. **If this is part of the reason you hesitate to apply, we’d encourage you to reconsider and give us the opportunity to review your application.** At Neo4j, we are committed to building awareness and helping to improve these issues.



One of our central objectives is to provide an inclusive, diverse, and equitable workplace for everyone to develop their potential and have a positive, career-defining experience. We look forward to receiving your application.



**Neo4j Values:**

Neo4j is a Silicon Valley company with a Swedish soul. We foster collaboration and each of us is empowered to contribute and put our innovative stamp on projects. We hire candidates who reflect the following Neo4j core values:



(we)-[:VALUE]->(relationships)  

(we)-[:FOCUS\_ON]->(userSuccess)  

(we)-[:THRIVE\_IN]->(:Culture {type: [‘Open’, ‘Inclusive’]})  

(we)-[:ASSUME]->(:Intent {direction:’Positive’})  

(we)-[:WELCOME]->(:Discussions {nature: ‘IntellectuallyHonest’})  

(we)-[:DELIVER\_ON]->(ourCommitments)



Neo4j is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. Please read the privacy notice regarding Neo4j's recruitment process to understand how we will handle the personal data that you provide.

title: Enterprise Business Development Representative, Nordics & Benelux
description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!*We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.*
About the job
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!  

  

*We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.*  

  

Company Overview  

  

At Proofpoint, we have a passion for protecting people, data, and brands from today’s advanced threats and compliance risks. We hire the best people in the business to* Build and enhance our proven security platform.
* Blend innovation and speed in a constantly evolving cloud architecture
* Analyse new threats and offer deep insight through data-driven intel
* Collaborate with customers to help solve their toughest security challenges


We are singularly devoted to helping our customers protect what matters most. That’s why we’re a leader in next-generation cybersecurity—and why more than half of the Fortune 100 trust us as a security partner.  

  

The Role  

We are currently seeking a highly motivated and energetic individual to join our Business Development team to generate qualified sales opportunities for our Enterprise Nordic & Benelux Sales team. As part of the Business Development team, you will be working closely with the regional sales and marketing teams to generate sales accepted leads via multiple channels with a mix of inbound (lead follow-up) and outbound (prospecting) activities.  

  

As a Business Development Representative, you will be responsible for gathering intelligence and developing a deep understanding of your assigned accounts. You will then action this intelligence to connect our sales team with influencers and decision makers within the prospect accounts and across all vertical markets.  

  

You will work closely with both Account Management and Marketing to define and execute a successful account-based sales strategy for the Nordic & Benelux region  

  

Your day-to-day* Qualify and develop inbound and outbound sales accepted leads and respond to product inquiries
* Gather actionable intelligence (competition, projects, purchase intent, etc.) for the list of accounts that you will be responsible for
* Follow-up on all leads generated by marketing and convert initial interest into sales accepted leads
* Manage email campaigns to generate new sales prospects
* Manage cold-calling telephone-based campaigns to generate new sales prospects
* Complete accurate tracking of communication with current and potential customers in Salesforce.com
* Schedule demonstrations between Enterprise Sales team members and potential customer


What You Bring To The Team* Highly motivated individual with a competitive personality, and good attention to detail
* Previous experience with solutions that can be deployed in private or public clouds a plus
* Experience working with Salesforce.com or other CRM is a bonus
* Excellent phone and interpersonal communication skills (verbal and written) as well as organisational skills
* Previous experience working and succeeding in a goal-driven environment preferred
* Academic qualifications Degree level educated ideally
* Fluent English & Swedish language skills required. Any additional languages are a plus


Why Proofpoint  

  

As a customer focused and driven-to-win organization with leading edge products, there are many exciting reasons to join the Proofpoint team. We believe in hiring the best the brightest and cultivating a culture of collaboration and appreciation. As we continue to grow and expand globally, we understand that hiring the right people and treating them well is key to our success! We are a multi-national company with locations in 10 countries, with each location contributing to Proofpoint’s amazing culture!*If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!*

title: Specialistsäljare inom Hybrid Platforms
description:
Är du redo att ta steget och utmana dig själv både personligt och professionellt? Som specialistsäljare hos oss, får du chansen att inte bara hitta nya kunder, utan också utveckla och stärka relationerna med våra befintliga kunder. Tillsammans med ditt team blir du en strategisk rådgivare för våra kunder i deras digitala resa! Låter det spännande?



Ta chansen och sök rollen som Specialistsäljare hos oss idag!

  

**Din roll på Atea**
--------------------



Den här rollen handlar om att bygga och vårda relationer – med kunder inom både privat och offentlig sektor, internt på Atea och med våra fantastiska partners. Vi har ett otroligt nätverk av leverantörer och partners som inte bara samarbetar med oss, utan också erbjuder utbildningar för våra specialister. Arbetet består av många delar, vilket gör det både komplext, roligt och utmanande.
  

  

Exempel på dina arbetsuppgifter är:


* Arbeta som avtalsansvarig hos våra kunder, vilket innebär uppföljning, hantering av lösningsförslag och avtalsfrågor samt förhandlingar
* Utmana och vägleda våra kunder till nya lösningar och tjänster som hjälper dem på sin digitala resa
* Hantera prissättning, kostnadskalkylering, juridiska frågor och upphandlingar


Våra kunders investeringar i Hybrid Platform med tillhörande tjänster är viktigare än någonsin och är verksamhetskritiska som kräver hög service, rådgivning och support i världsklass. Just nu söker vi dig som vill jobba som specilistsäljare inom Hybrid Platform med fokus på att sälja, utveckla och förvalta våra kunders datacenter, server/lagring, nätverk och hybrid cloud.


**Vad vi söker hos dig**
------------------------



Vi tror på dig och dina kompetenser, som är nyckeln till framgång i den här rollen! Vi ser att du trivs som en "Trusted Advisor" och har en stark drivkraft att ständigt lära dig nya saker. Du har ett proaktivt förhållningssätt och drivs av att hitta lösningar på problem, både självständigt och i grupp. Du är engagerad och självständig i ditt arbete, noggrann och alltid redo att gräva djupt för att möta kundens behov och krav. Du är en stjärna på att skapa relationer och ger alltid ett förtroendeingivande och trovärdigt intryck.  

  

För att lyckas i tjänsten som specialistsäljare ser vi att du har:


* Erfarenhet av försäljning inom B2B
* Flertalet års erfarenhet av arbete med försäljning
* Erfarenhet inom avtalshantering, svarar på upphandlingar samt förhandla
* Svenska och engelska språkkunskaper, flytande i både tal och skrift


Meriterande:


* Kunskap och erfarenhet av någon av de andra stora datacenter/nätverkstillverkarna
* Erfarenhet av upphandlingar eller annan juridisk erfarenhet, gärna inom LOU
* Erfarenhet av tjänsteförsäljning
* Erfarenhet av Azure & Hybrid Cloud lösningar

**Vårt löfte till dig**
-----------------------



Hos oss får du vara med att bidra till ett smartare, effektivare och mer hållbart samhälle. Med fokus på utveckling, laganda och personligt ansvarstagande ser vi till att göra skillnad. Vi uppmuntrar och stöttar varandra, och tar vara på våra individuella förmågor, perspektiv och erfarenheter. Det är därför du är viktig för oss. För att du är du, för att du är nyfiken och för att du vill växa professionellt – och som människa. Tillsammans skapar vi laget som bygger Sverige med it.


**Kontakt & mer information**
-----------------------------



Har du frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef, Maria Siewer, maria.siewer@atea.se och om du har frågor angående rekryteringsprocessen är du välkommen att kontakta TA Partner Molly Benner på molly.benner@atea.se. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, ansök därmed redan idag.



Du kommer i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgå ett personlighet- och färdighetstest. Som en kvalitativ del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater även en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.



Atea vill vara The Place To Be, den självklara platsen, för alla människor då vi värdesätter och jobbar aktivt med mångfald och inkludering.


**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan till oss!**

title: Process Owner / Incident Management within Atea Managed Services
description:
Are you a hands-on leader ready to drive excellence in Incident Management?



Do you thrive on optimizing processes, fostering collaboration, and ensuring operational stability? We are looking for a Process Owner for Incident Management to join our dynamic Incident Management team. In this key role, you will lead the development and continuous improvement of our incident management process, ensuring efficiency, innovation, and business continuity.



Step into this exciting opportunity and play a vital role in building the future with it together with us!

  

**About this role**
-------------------



As the Process Owner for Incident Management, you will lead a team with 11 Incident Managers directly reporting to you. These Incident Managers are located across the Nordic countries also working with Major Incidents 24/7. In your role, you will mentor and guide your team, acting both as a coach and a player, to help them become successful Incident Managers who deliver real results. Your team will be spread across the Nordics, but we see that you are based in one of the following cities, as this will be where this position will be placed: Drammen, Malmö or Ballerup, as this role will be office based.



At Atea we offer you a place to further develop your skills and where each day offers new challenges to solve and gives you opportunities to grow together with your team, colleagues and customers.


**Furthermore, you will be working with the following:**

* Own and develop the Incident Management process, ensuring efficiency and value.
* Lead and support a team of Incident Managers, providing guidance and fostering collaboration.
* Drive continuous improvements, reducing recurring incidents.
* Ensure clear communication and coordination with IT teams, business stakeholders, and senior management.
* Monitor and report on performance metrics, KPIs, and incident trends, ensuring transparency and accountability.

**About you**
-------------



Your personal characteristics are crucial to succeed in the role and to thrive at Atea. The Process Owners primary responsibility is to lead and inspire a high-performing team of process managers, drive efficiency, innovation, and ensure alignment of IT processes with organizational goals.



To succeed in the role as Process Ownerr we believe you to have the following:


* **Leadership Experience**: Experience of leading multidisciplinary and international teams within Incident Management.
* **Process Expertise:** Deep understanding of IT processes, frameworks (e.g., ITIL, Agile), and process improvement methodologies.
* **Communication:** Ability to articulate ideas, inspire teams, and influence stakeholders at all levels of the organization.
* **Problem Solving:** Analytic thinker with a hands-on approach to solving complex challenges in a fast-paced environment.
* **Collaboration:** Strong interpersonal skills to foster teamwork within and across diverse functional groups.
* **Adaptability:** Resilience and adaptability to navigate ambiguity and drive organizational efficiency.
* **Language:** Fluent in one of the following Nordic languages: Swedish, Danish, or Norwegian. In addition to being proficient in these languages, you should also be comfortable speaking English, as it is the company's official language.

**About Atea Managed Services**
-------------------------------



Within Atea Managed Services, we are experts in IT operations. Regardless of whether our customers want to outsource parts or the entire IT operation, we are our customers preferred operating partner. We help free up resources and increase the overall efficiency of their IT organizations. We do this by delivering cost-effective operational services with the highest quality regardless of the customers' platform requirements. This can mean in the customer's own data center, in public cloud platforms or in our own Atea Cloud. Atea Managed Services is available in five countries and more than 1,500 employees work within the business area. We have operating personnel on duty around the clock.


**Contact Information**
-----------------------



If you have any questions about the position, you are welcome to contact Rikke Hay-Schmidt via rikke.hay-schmidt@atea.dk. Alternatively, Molly Benner, TA Partner, via molly.benner@atea.se. Apply today as the position may be filled before the application deadline.



The next step in the process consists of a short phone call where your experiences and skills will be reviewed. You will also hear more about the position and have the opportunity to ask any questions you may have. As a qualitative part of our recruitment process, final candidates undergo a background check and in-depth personality tests to increase our knowledge of you as our future employee.



Atea wants to be The Place To Be, the obvious place, for all people as we value and actively work with diversity and inclusion.


**We warmly welcome your application to us!** *This recruitment is handled by us at Atea, and we therefore decline calls and emails from recruitment and staffing companies.*

title: EMI Platform Engineer
description:
Are you enthusiastic about contributing to innovative platform functionalities and playing an important role in transforming industries through digitalization?
At Epiroc, innovation and collaboration are at the core of everything we do. Our vision is clear: to accelerate the transformation of mining towards a greener and more sustainable industry. As an EMI Platform Engineer, you will play a key role in maintaining and developing our platform, working at the intersection of technology and real-world impact.
Let’s accelerate the transformation. Together.  


Join our team
We are looking for a talented Platform Engineer to join our highly skilled and collaborative team in Luleå. Our platform team plays a crucial role in ensuring stability, security, and continuous development of the software platform that powers our EMI Mobilaris application. This is an opportunity to work in a self-driven, respected, and influential team with close collaboration across support and R&D teams.  


Your mission
As an EMI Platform Engineer, your role involves maintaining, developing, and evolving our platform, enhancing its stability, security, and innovation. You will improve and maintain the platform through stability testing and security updates, implement new features and technologies as well as troubleshoot and analyze incidents that require deeper technical expertise. Additionally, a key part of your role will be to create tools and scripts to empower the support team, making it easier for them to identify and resolve issues efficiently. Collaboration will be at the core of your role, as you work closely with internal teams to ensure that the platform meets all performance and security standards.  


Your profile
We are looking for someone who is proactive, solution-oriented, and enjoys working in a collaborative environment. While a degree in Computer Science or a related field is beneficial, it is not a requirement. What matters most is your solid expertise in Linux, a deep understanding of database management and general scripting, particularly in a Linux environment. Equally important are your personal qualities, including adaptability, eagerness to learn, and an initiative-driven and curious approach. The ability to work independently, identify issues, and implement solutions is essential along with strong communication skills, as you will be required to articulate technical solutions clearly and collaborate across teams to drive efficiency and innovation.
Experience with cluster technologies, knowledge of cloud environments like Azure or an understanding of cybersecurity principles, are all beneficial but not required.
Fluency in English, both written and spoken, is required, while proficiency in Swedish is considered beneficial.  


Location and other
This position is located in Luleå, Sweden. We offer a hybrid workplace, providing flexibility and promoting a healthier balance between professional and personal life. Occasional travel is a possibility if desired.  


Why Epiroc?
By joining our team, you’ll make a big difference in the energy transition. At Epiroc, we take pride in being passionate innovators, driving the change toward a brighter future for both people and the planet. Guided by our values of Collaboration, Commitment, and Innovation, we foster a culture of trust, growth, and lasting impact.  


To support your journey, we offer a competitive Total Rewards Package, including:
* Global career opportunities
* Learning & Development programs
* Benefits package, including variable compensation (bonus)
* Flexible work culture promoting balance and well-being
* Global Parental Leave Policy
* Community involvement

Application and contact information
We encourage you to submit your application through our online career site as soon as possible, but no later than Mars 11th, 2025. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis, and the position may be filled before last application date.  


We are committed to a thorough recruitment process, including interviews, reference checks and assessments. To ensure a safe working environment, we conduct identity checks and drug and alcohol screening. Our process is designed to be fair and inclusive; you can expect transparent communication and a balanced evaluation of your skills and experience.  


For questions regarding the position, please contact:
Hiring Manager, Daniel Marklund, daniel.marklund@epiroc.com
For questions regarding the recruitment process, please contact:
Recruitment specialist, Emma Domare, emma.domare@epiroc.com  


Please note that due to regulations, we cannot handle applications received through email.  


We have already made our choices regarding advertising channels and consulting providers, and kindly request not to be contacted regarding such inquiries.  



**It all starts with people.** The world needs metals and minerals for the energy transition and our cities and infrastructure must be developed to serve a growing population. To succeed, we need to speed up the shift towards more sustainable mining and construction industries. We at Epiroc accelerate this transformation, together with customers and business partners in more than 150 countries, by developing and providing innovative and safe equipment, digital solutions, and aftermarket support.
All new thinkers are welcome. We are looking for those who want to develop, grow, and dare to think new. In Epiroc we attract, develop, and retain diverse talent valuing authenticity and unique perspectives, driving our spirit of innovation. We foster an inclusive culture where diversity isn't just a goal but a part of our values and way of working. This is how we do business for a sustainable future. Learn more at www.epiroc.com

title: Senior Power Electronics Engineer
description:
Senior Power Electronics Engineer


Swedium Global Services is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.


Job Name: Senior Hardware Engineer


Location: Onsite in Sweden


We are looking for electronics hardware engineer with hands-on experience in the fast-evolving field of power electronics.  

  

**Role**  

  

You will be part of a design team responsible for developing the power solutions for baseband products. Typical tasks include DC-DC converter design, schematic design, troubleshooting, and hands-on lab measurements. You will work closely with other design disciplines, such as digital designers, firmware, and thermal design.  

  

**Skills:**


* Bachelor’s or Master’s in Electrical Engineering, Power Electronics, or similar
* New graduate up to 5 years of working experience
* Interest in electronics design and hands-on measurements. Interest in simulation and scripting is a plus

Fluent in English, both spoken and written  
* 

Additional Requirements:


* Strong interpersonal skills and ability to network
* Adaptability and innovative thinking
* Result-oriented with strong planning and organizational skills

  
Job Overview


* Location : Gothenburg, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : DC-DC converter design, schematic design, Lab

title: Senior System Simulation Engineer
description:
Senior System Simulation Engineer


Swedium Global Services is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.


Job Name: Senior System Simulation Engineer


Location: Onsite in Sweden


We are now looking for a senior Simulation and Analysis Engineer to be part of a team working with system simulation.  

  

**Role:**  

  

You along with the team will be responsible for the system simulation platform & model development for battery electric vehicles. The system simulations are carried out within MATLAB/Simulink and are used throughout the product lifecycle, from the concept design phase to sales, aftermarket & maintenance. The simulation platform consists of both component and plant modeling to control and software in loop.  

  

You will in addition perform various simulation tasks, where we are expected to deliver & support too many ongoing projects and initiatives, structured reporting, analysis & conclusions of the simulation results are part of your role.  

  

In addition, the team is working with model development for physical test rigs & towards HIL rigs. Furthermore, you will work to strengthen our virtual portfolio with digital twins where we combine system simulation models with data & machine learning to ultimately enable digital services for our customers and stakeholders.  

  

We believe that to be successful in the position, you are a team player with a collaborative mindset, and you have strong experience in the simulation domain from previous positions. You have automotive or electrical system development experience working in cross-functional teams.  



**Qualifications:**


* Mster of Science in engineering or equivalent
* 5+ years' experience in automotive system simulation or equivalent
* Experience in data-driven model development
* Proficiency in MATLAB/Simulink and Python
* Good communication skills in English, both spoken and written

  
Job Overview


* Location : Gothenburg, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : MATLAB/Simulink, HIL, Python. Model Developement

title: Marknadskommunikatör Evenemang
description:
**Arbetsbeskrivning**
---------------------


Vi söker nu en Marknadskommunikatör som vill vara med och stärka Göteborgs attraktionskraft genom att, i nära samarbete med relevanta och viktiga arrangörer och intressenter, lyfta och kommunicera evenemang och projekt som stärker Göteborgs varumärke som evenemangsstad.
  

  

Rollen innebär att självständigt utveckla relationer, kommunikationsidéer och berättelser som skapar uppmärksamhet och bidrar till att få fler att upptäcka och välja Göteborg.
  

  

Exempel på arbetsuppgifter är:
  

  

* Utarbeta kommunikationsstrategier och kommunikationsplaner för olika målgrupper (t ex arrangörer, idrottsförbund, samarbetspartners, andra destinationer, beslutsfattare etc.).
* Skapa och formulera kommunikation i olika format och kanaler utifrån kommunikationsstrategier och kommunikationsplaner.
* Utveckla kommunikationsidéer/berättelser som stärker Göteborgs varumärke som evenemangstad.
* Skapa, formulera, förpacka kommunikationsidéer/berättelser och identifiera och genomföra aktiviteter som stärker berättelsen.
* Analysera behov av kanaler för att kommunicera om evenemang i Göteborg.
* Bearbeta och samverka med media.

  

* Skapa och utveckla relationer med relevanta och viktiga aktörer och intressenter (t ex arrangörer, idrottsförbund, samarbetspartners etc.) för att samverka och samarbeta med dem kring kommunikationsinsatser.

  

* Ge rådgivning och stöd i kommunikationsfrågor internt (Evenemangsavdelningen)
* Vara redaktör för evenemangsavdelningens del i publikationer som avdelningsrapporter, års- och hållbarhetsredovisning etc.
* Omvärldsbevakning
* Uppföljning, rapportering och statistik

  

Allt kommunikationsarbete sker i nära samråd/samordning med Marknad- och Kommunikations-avdelningen samt övriga affärsområden inom Göteborg & Co.
**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------


Vi söker dig som har minst 3 års yrkeserfarenhet av kvalificerat kommunikationsarbete samt en högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande inom området. Du har erfarenhet av att utveckla kommunikationsidéer och skapa budskap för olika målgrupper, format och kanaler samt erfarenhet av köpt, förtjänad och egen digital kommunikation. Du är en mycket god skribent och är flytande i svenska i tal och skrift samt har goda kunskaper i engelska i tal och skrift. Vidare har du erfarenhet av att nätverka och bygga relationer, liksom vana att hantera flera parallella projekt samtidigt.
  

  

Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av program inom Adobe Creative Cloud, Wordpress, SEO samt av att beställa byråtjänster.
  

  

Som person tar du initiativ och driver ditt arbete framåt på ett strukturerat sätt. Du är kreativ och kommer med nya idéer och synvinklar och trivs med att arbeta i nära samarbete med andra. För att lyckas i rollen trivs du med en variation av strategiska och operativa arbetsuppgifter.
  

  

Vår målbild med sikte på 2030 är att Göteborg ska vara norra Europas ledande hållbara evenemangsstad, varför kunskap och intresse för hållbarhet bör vara en självklarhet för dig.  

  

  

  

Övrigt  

  

Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med start under början av 2025. Tjänsten innebär visst arbete på kvällstid samt visst kvälls- och helgjobb under genomföranden av evenemang. Vi kommer att läsa ansökningar fortlöpande så skicka gärna in din ansökan (meritförteckning och personligt brev) så snart som möjligt via goteborgco.se, dock senast 2025-03-02. Vid frågor om tjänsten kontakta Jennie Heidenfors, Projektchef. Övriga frågor kontakta Maria Bergman (HR-chef). Kontaktuppgifter: jennie.heidenfors@goteborg.com och maria.bergman@goteborg.com.
**Om Göteborg & Co**
--------------------


Göteborg & Co:s mål är att få fler att upptäcka och välja Göteborg. Det görs genom att i bred samverkan leda och driva utvecklingen av Göteborg som hållbar destination så att alla som lever och verkar här gynnas av en växande besöksnäring. Göteborg & Co är en del av Göteborgs Stad. Läs mer på goteborgco.se.

2025-03-02

-----------------------

---------------------


Vi söker nu en digital kommunikatör som kan marknadsföra och driva trafik till evenemang i Göteborg för att få fler att upptäcka och välja Göteborgs fantastiska evenemangsutbud

title: Junior Front Office Manager
description:
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch’s Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
  
Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
  
At Sinch we “Dream Big”, “Win Together”, “Keep it simple”, and “Make it Happen”. These values are our foundation!
  
  

**About the role:**  

We are currently looking for a Junior Front Office Manager to join Sinch Group Treasury team. You will become an integral part of Sinch Group Treasury front office function in a role providing exposure to a diverse range of treasury activities in an evolving Treasury function.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

* Execute daily activities related to short-term liquidity management and forecasting
* Support in Sinch Group FX management
* Assist with managing Sinch short-term funding portfolio, including debt issuance, financing activities, and monitoring compliance with policy and documentation
* Collaborate with the rest of treasury team to ensure seamless settlement of transactions, compliance, and reporting
* Perform internal bank activities and tasks for subsidiaries
* Conduct financial reporting and analysis as well as other ad hoc activities
* Participate / contribute to the continued development of the Group Treasury function
* General treasury administrative tasks


This role is based at Sinch HQ in Stockholm, Sweden within Sinch Corporate Finance function.
  
  

**Requirements:**  

To be successful in the role you have a strong interest in financial markets, macroeconomic data, and global news. You are accustomed to numbers and have an urge to grow and develop your skills. You are able to work in a fast-paced environment, adapt to change and deal with large quantities of information.
  
We welcome applications from recent graduates with strong academic performance and relevant internships or coursework as well as from candidates who have a few year’s experience from treasury, financial markets, or other industry related role.
  
  

* Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Accounting, or other related field
* Strong analytical skills, with a detail-oriented and proactive approach
* Strong skills in Microsoft Excel
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for engaging with internal- and external stakeholders


Our hiring process
  
We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
  
We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!
company_description: We help companies to communicate with customers via messaging, voice and video using multiple channels. Simplifying life by bringing all people and businesses together using technology is our purpose.

title: Senior Cloud Architect - MS Entra ID
description:
Uppdragsbeskrivning
  
Vi söker en Cloud Architect till ett IAM team hos en av våra uppdragsgivare i Linköping. I rollen blir du expert på att designa, optimera och säkra deras molnprocesser med fokus på Microsoft Azure. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i företagets fortsatta Cloud-resa och leda utvecklingen av robusta och skalbara Azure-lösningar med Entra ID i centrum.
  
  

**Dina huvuduppgifter:**  

* Arkitektur, design och implementering av säkra och effektiva Azure-baserade molnlösningar med Entra ID.
* Utveckling av övergripande IAM-strategier för att säkerställa optimal prestanda, skalbarhet och säkerhet i Azure-miljön.
* Samarbete med teammedlemmar och kunder för att förstå och tillfredsställa företagets behov med skräddarsydda Azure-lösningar.
* Analysera krav och behovsbilder
* Säkerställa att krav, regler, lagar, processer, standards och policies efterlevs
* Presentera och kommunicera lösningar mot olika målgrupper och i olika forum
* Dokumentera lösningar


Din profil
  
Du är självgående men samtidigt gillar du att jobba i team som har intresse för EntraID och Cloud-säkerhet. Vi tror att du har analytisk förmåga, är nyfiken och gillar att dela kunskap.
  
  

Har du dessutom erfarenhet från globala och mer komplexa organisationer är det en viktig erfarenhet då vår kund är en större global organisation.
  
  

Som person gillar du problemlösning i en dynamisk miljö där den ena dagen sällan är den andra lik.
  
  

**Krav:**  

* Solid erfarenhet av Entra ID och dess funktioner.
* Bred kompetens inom Identity and Access Management (IAM).
* Djupgående kunskap om IAM-koncept som JEA, JIT, RBAC, ABAC Access Review.
* Erfarenhet av federerad SSO med SAML, OAuth, OIDC.
* Flytande i Svenska och Engelska.


Välkommen att bli en del av ett team som ska forma framtiden för företagets molnstrategi.
  
Sök redan idag! Vi behöver din ansökan, inkluderat CV, på svenska. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande, så vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan då anbudstiden är kort.
  
NXT Interim och NXT Rekrytering är ett nischat och innovativt företag inom konsult- och rekryteringsbranschen. Vi arbetar inom HR, IT, Ekonomi, Sälj och Marknad och har över 20 års erfarenhet i branschen. Vi erbjuder våra konsulter förmåner som sjukförsäkring, remote-arbetsplatser och flera andra förmåner som förgyller vardagen.

title: Product Designer
description:
### **Arbetsuppgifter**


Vi söker en erfaren Product Designer för ett spännande uppdrag hos vår kund. I rollen kommer du att arbeta nära tvärfunktionella team för att skapa användarvänliga och engagerande gränssnitt. Du kommer att ansvara för att designa och prototypa nya lösningar, samt testa och validera dem med verkliga användare. Uppdraget innebär att du arbetar i en data-driven miljö där experiment och iterativ utveckling är centrala.

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:**

* Designa och utveckla användargränssnitt för B2C-tjänster.
* Skapa och iterera på prototyper baserat på hypoteser och feedback från användare.
* Arbeta nära andra designers, utvecklare och produktägare i tvärfunktionella team.
* Arbeta i Figma och Adobe Creative Cloud för att leverera designlösningar.
* Analysera och använda data för att driva designbeslut och förbättra användarupplevelsen.

### 
**Kvalifikationer**

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet som Product Designer, gärna inom B2C-prenumerationstjänster.


* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Figma och Adobe Creative Cloud.


* Stark förmåga inom interaktions- och visuell design med dokumenterad erfarenhet av att skapa engagerande användargränssnitt.


* Förmåga att bygga prototyper snabbt och validera dessa med riktiga användare.


* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en data-driven miljö och genomföra experiment för att driva förbättringar.


* Bra på att ta smarta genvägar för att snabbt testa och iterera idéer.


* En lagspelare som trivs med samarbete och stärker sitt team.


* Högskoleutbildning inom relevant område.


* Svenska är meriterande, engelska krävs.

  


### **Personliga egenskaper**


För att lyckas i uppdraget som Product Designer ser vi gärna att du är självgående, tar initiativ och är lösningsorienterad. Du trivs i en dynamisk och snabbt föränderlig arbetsmiljö och har en god förmåga att kommunicera och samarbeta effektivt med kollegor från olika discipliner.

  

### **När du blir en av oss**

*Som konsult hos JobBusters kan du känna dig trygg med ett kollektivavtal i ryggen, tillgängliga konsultchefer och engagerade rekryterare. Du som konsult får även tillgång till vårt nätverk av spännande företag och uppdragsgivare! För oss är det viktigt att du som konsult trivs, känner en trygghet och gemenskap till oss som arbetsgivare. Vi erbjuder tjänstepension, löneväxling och möjlighet till flexpension. Du får även tillgång till vår förmånsportal, där du utöver friskvårdsbidrag har tillgång till mängder av rabatter och erbjudanden inom hälsa, hem och fritid, transport, sjukvård och mycket mer! Ditt välmående är av högsta prioritet för oss och vi erbjuder därför dig som anställd Företagshälsovård för att hantera vardagens alla utmaningar, både på jobbet och i privatlivet.*

### **Lön**


Enligt överenskommelse.

### **Tillträde och ansökan**


Heltid, kontorstider. Vår kund önskar start omgående och uppdraget förväntas löpa i 3 månader med möjlighet till förlängning. Du kommer att vara anställd av JobBusters som konsult och arbeta hos vår spännande kund i Göteborg. Uppdraget kräver att du arbetar på plats 4 dagar i veckan. Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande och i konsultvärlden går processerna oftast snabbt. Rollen kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan (gärna i Word-format). Ansökningar mottagna innan 2025-02-10 kommer hanteras i ett första urval. Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-02-14.

title: Financial Accountant & Controller - Stockholm
description:
We are seeking a Financial Accountant & Controller for a long-term project aimed at replacing the client's legacy insurance systems with a new, modern solution. The client works in the banking sector.

**Responsibilities:**


In this role, you will be responsible for various accounting-related tasks, including monthly and quarterly closings, account reconciliations, and internal controls. You will also conduct financial analyses and investigations while contributing to the development of system support and accounting processes.

**Qualifications:**

* Experience in accounting and financial reporting within a large organization with complex reporting structures and internal accounting requirements.
* 5-8 years of relevant experience.
* Strong understanding of the interconnections between different accounting components.
* Expertise in monthly and quarterly closings, account reconciliations, and internal controls.
* Experience in financial analysis and investigations.
* Knowledge of system support and process improvement in accounting.
* Strong analytical mindset, structured approach, and ability to work independently.
* Fluency in Swedish, both written and spoken.
* Experience with Oracle ERP, EPM cloud-based solutions and from the banking sector.
* It is meritorious if you have previous experience in the insurance sector.

**Key Competencies for Success:**


To excel in this role, you should have a strong sense of ownership and accountability, remain composed under pressure, and work in a structured and organized manner. You should be able to balance attention to detail with a broader strategic perspective. Delivering accurate, well-reconciled, and polished reports should come naturally to you. A curious and analytical mindset, along with a drive to understand the bigger picture, will be essential for success in this position.

**Application and Start Date:**


Start Date: 17 March 2025


End Date: 15 September 2025. Good possibilities of extensions of 6 months


Deadline: 13 February 2025


Location: Stockholm


Contact Person: 0790 062 711


Selections and interviews are ongoing!


Sway Sourcing is an innovative recruitment partner, specializing in matching the right talent with the right company—quickly and efficiently. Our primary focus areas include Finance, Administration, HR, Marketing, and IT, but we also have the broad expertise and flexibility needed to deliver tailor-made recruitment solutions across all industries.



Despite being a relatively new player in the market, we have already gained the trust of some of Sweden’s largest companies, operating both nationally and internationally. With bases in Sweden and Spain, we offer a unique combination of local expertise and global reach. Our strong network and deep industry insights make us the go-to partner for companies looking to stay ahead in their recruitment efforts.

title: Senior Penetration Tester
description:
**About Us**



Integrity360 is one of Europe’s leading cyber security specialists operating from office locations spread out across Europe, providing a comprehensive range of professional, support and managed cyber security services for our 300+ clients. With four top-class Security Operation Centers, we offer a complete end-to-end security services covering our clients’ security from every angle. Our services include Managed Security, Cyber Security Testing, Incident Response, Security Integration, PCI Compliance and Cyber Risk & Assurance services.

  

What sets Integrity360 apart is our excellent team of people that drive the business forward. The company was founded with a focus on technical expertise and that philosophy remains today. The skills and experience in our company are some of the greatest in the industry and clients remain with Integrity360 because they can rely on and trust us to go above and beyond to ensure their needs are met. Listed multiple times on Gartner Market Guides for Managed Security Services.

 **Job Role / Responsibilities**



This is a full-time position with the Integrity360 office in Stockholm, Sweden. The position is responsible for performing all forms of complex technical activities (including the Internal / External Network, Applications, Cloud, Mobile, etc.). These assessments will occasionally be done at the client site, primarily in Sweden. Proficiency in communication is essential, both written and verbal, as well as the ability to convey complex technical information to key international clients.

 **Primary Duties/Responsibilities include:**


* Perform in-depth penetration tests across applications, infrastructure, cloud and mobile platforms.
* Execute zero-knowledge black-box, grey-box and white-box penetration tests of specific areas within the enterprise.
* Perform tests and assessments in the cloud, including but not limited to AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.
* Perform security reviews of servers, network devices, architecture and application designs.
* Act as an escalation point for team members regarding project-related issues.
* Deliver pre-sales support, including project scoping, estimations, and technical assistance via calls, meetings, and presentations with key clients.
* Enhance Integrity360's security offerings, refining methodologies, reporting standards, and educational materials.
* Represent Integrity360 at international events, forums or training events.
* Demonstrate the ability to be an industry expert.

  


**Required Skills / Experience**


* 5+ or more years’ experience in penetration testing or red team operations, including testing critical functionality, banking systems and more.
* Manual penetration testing experience above and beyond running automated tools.
* Expertise in AWS, Azure, and cloud-native technologies, including VMs, containers, and infrastructure as code.
* Previous experience as a Subject Matter Expert, or similar role.
* Experience in testing ICS, SCADA, mainframes, containers, hardware appliances,
* Excellent understanding of firewalls, proxies, iptables, AVs and EDR products, VPNs, IDS/IPS, and various networking concepts.
* Knowledge of wireless technologies, mainly RF, Cellular, NFC, and Bluetooth technology.
* Experience in testing OSX / iOS and Android devices.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in front of key clients.
* Experience in developing custom security tools and scripts.
* Fluency in one or more programming or scripting languages: Java, Python, C/C++, C#, .NET, ASP, PHP,

  


**Certifications/Qualifications**


* One or more industry leading certification (OSCP, CRTE, CRTO, OSCE, OSWP, ARTE, CPTS, etc.)
* CHECK Team Leader or equivalent is a plus.
* Computer Sciences, IT or Cybersecurity related degree is a plus.

  


**Working at Integrity360**



At Integrity360 we aim to reflect what’s important through the benefits we offer. We survey our people regularly and encourage discussions around these tops so we can understand what really makes a difference. Our benefits priorities are physical, mental and financial wellbeing.

 **Mental & Physical wellbeing benefits:**


* Private healthcare provided by Attunda Hälsan
* Health insurance provided by Söderberg and Partners
* Onsite Gym (Kista office)
* SEK 5,000.00/year for Friskvårdbidrag, our allowance can be used for Gym memberships, to improve health and more!

  


**Financial wellbeing:**



We guarantee that every employee will have their pay reviewed at least once every year, if not more regularly. We aim to pay within the market range for all roles and keep pace with inflation on average.



What we offer:


* Twice yearly salary reviews
* 6% Contributory Pension
* Income Protection
* Death-in-Service cover

  


**Other benefits include:**


* 30 days’ annual leave and options to carry over 5 days to the next financial year
* Our L&D program, we work with various platforms including Cybrary, Udemy, Preply, Pluralsight, Swift and HTB ensuring our people are up to date with their industry knowledge. Offering opportunities to further upskill and gain industry leading certifications.
company_addresses: Integrity360, The Concourse, Block D, Beacon Court, Sandyford, Co. Dublin, Ireland
